name: One Degree
long_description:
One Degree is a technology driven nonprofit organization that helps individuals and families access the resources they need to improve their lives and achieve social and economic mobility. 

One Degree's mission is to empower people to create a path out of poverty for themselves and for their communities. Our core product is a web and mobile platform makes it easy for low-income families to find, manage, and review nonprofit and government services. 

Our platform has become the go-to tool for help-seekers – and the people who support them, such as case managers and social workers – throughout the San Francisco Bay Area and Los Angeles County in California, and in Gainesville, Florida.

We currently operate three major products: the One Degree website and Android and iOS apps. Thousands of people in the Bay Area and Los Angeles rely on One Degree’s website and apps to access health care, food banks, employment services, and much more. We also support communities around the country to start their own One Degree chapters.

The company’s products are made in Korea, leveraging the latest K-beauty innovations in the formula, packaging, and speed-to-market. MBX has offices in San Francisco, Seoul, Shanghai, and Taipei, and its brands include Kaja, I Dew Care, Pony Effect, I’m Meme, and Nooni.

long_description:
CodeCombat is a multiplayer programming game for learning how to code. With thousands of schools and millions of students, we are bringing K12 computer science education to everyone, regardless of gender, race, or background. Everyone should have the opportunity to learn.

The ultimate goal of CodeCombat is to bring more users into the field of computer programming by making the logic and syntax more accessible and enjoyable to learn. The end game is to educate a whole new generation of computer programmers that started their journey by slaying ogres and defending their castles from oncoming enemy hordes.

We teach Python, JavaScript, and other languages directly in the browser. Teachers with no computer science background can get started in five minutes. In a world where all programmers have had to be second-language learners, do you want your students to become native speakers of code? Let's chat about bringing CodeCombat to your school!

Find us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/CodeCombat

We help get compensation for airplane passengers that have experienced delayed, cancelled, and overbooked flights. As we grow, we are making the claim process much easier and faster. So come grow with us, and make the process of travel less grueling and more relaxing – as it should be!

We love new challenges! As a start-up, we’ve been through it all and thanks to this our AirHelpers have developed the skills to deal with it all, and more, all while remaining passionate about what we do – helping ordinary people – as flight delays can happen to anyone.

What helps us continuously develop, is our combination of talent and passion.

What makes us different?
Every single one of our employees can make an impact on the future of AirHelp – come up with an innovative idea – and we’ll help you implement it at AirHelp. This is an experience you can gain in very few places! 
If you’re looking to develop new skills, make an impact on not only global business, but ordinary, everyday travelers, and take risks developing and implementing new projects – what are you waiting for? Come join us today!

With a variety of departments to choose from: tech, finance, human resources, customer service (and the list goes on!) - you don’t have to narrow your horizons, just take your pick. Pick what you’ve got a knack for, and most importantly, what you enjoy!

AirHelp, helping people fly happy today
one_liner: AirHelp helps air passengers get compensation for delayed, cancelled…

long_description:
42 is an end-to-end analytics stack for DTC and wholesale brands.

Our platform shows you the right insights and data, anytime you need them:
- Hundreds of built-in metrics across Stores, eComm, Wholesale, or any other channel
- See all your sales, stock and customer in one report, with images
- Accurate cost, markdown and promo reporting
- Get answers in real-time, during your buyer / supplier meetings
- Get your store managers to use data, we've seen 10% margin increases from this
- Actually know how much stock you have.

We're more than just a dashboard...
- No infrastructure needed. We do the hosting and maintenance.
- No integrations (for you). We do the heavy-lifting and get your data into 42
- For brands, we work with all the major retailers (via xlsx, portals or EDI)
- For retailers, we can be your vendor portal
- We integrate with any system
- We work with you to tailor the analytics according to your products and naming

Our customers include AllSaints, Frasers Group, Incipio Group, Bandier, Deconic... and way more.

If you want to learn more about what we do, head over to our website: 42technologies.com
... or go to any AllSaints store and ask a store manager :)

Business travelers beat their budgets by making cost-conscious choices like booking in advance, selecting a cheaper hotel, or staying with friends. Rocketrip provides comprehensive reporting and seamlessly integrates into any existing corporate and expense technology stack. If you want to rein in business travel costs while improving corporate culture, visit rocketrip.com

name: PipelineDB
long_description: PipelineDB is an open-source PostgreSQL extension that enables realtime reporting use cases by continuously aggregating large streams of time series data down into summary data. It shines the most at larger scales, where storing lots of raw time-series data and aggregating it over and over again becomes inefficient. The amount of value that PipelineDB adds is directly proportional to the amount of continuous aggregation that an analytics use case can benefit from. PipelineDB should be used for analytics use cases that only require summary data, like realtime reporting dashboards. PipelineDB is not a good fit for exploratory analytics on siloed datasets.
one_liner: Open-source time-series data analytics extension for PostgreSQL

The machine learns and updates itself so that's it's always perfectly in sync with your users and your "content."​ We average 50% improvements in CTR, engagement and conversation - with only a day's work on your part. Imagine creating a truly dynamic, real-time digital property that enables the perfect experience for that user impression at that moment in time. That is LiftIgniter! 

Our team of PhDs has direct experience building state-of-the-art personalization systems at the petabyte scale for some of the largest companies on the planet. Unless you plan on hiring your own team with deep experience (not likely since very few people with that experience exist), you should contact us to talk about how we can supercharge your digital experiences.

long_description:
We create a positive customer experience through real time call verification technology.

Fraudsters cost businesses time and money, and make life more difficult on real customers - whether that’s outright stealing cash or slowing down the phone call authentication process. Next Caller helps businesses fight criminals, not customers, by safely passing through legitimate callers and identifying suspicious interactions. Using VeriCall™, businesses have the opportunity to stop phone fraud before it starts.  With our real-time RESTful API, Next Caller verifies good callers and detects spoofed calls to make your business Spoof Proof™ - flagging high-risk calls within milliseconds of the first ring.  Based on this threat-level analysis of every call, a business can decide how to handle the customer or criminal on the other end of the line.

long_description:
TerrAvion provides high revisit rate aerial imagery for agriculture.  Since 2016 we have been the largest volume provider.  


TerrAvion Aerial is the best value for growers in imagery:  
   -Imagery helps you to act in season in a comprehensive and quantitative way
   -Satellites aren't reliability and lack sufficient resolution for agronomic decision-making
   -Drones don't scale, and thus are expensive and a hassle

   -Partners have full access to API with all data we collect for use in all their applications

name: Edyn
long_description: The Edyn smart garden system lets you know what’s happening in your garden at all times. Whether you’re a novice gardener or managing a small-scale organic farm, Edyn is there to take the guesswork out of gardening. Inserted in the soil, the Edyn Garden Sensor gathers and analyzes data about changing weather and soil conditions. The Edyn App displays this data as a real-time snapshot of your garden, and pushes alerts and suggestions to maximize plant health. A separate component, the Edyn Water Valve, uses the data collected by the sensor to smartly control your existing watering system, watering your plants only when needed. With advanced tracking technology and intuitive design, the Edyn smart garden system keeps you connected to your garden or farm so you can grow healthier plants.
one_liner: Nest for lawn and garden

name: Shopagram
one_liner: Next Generation Home Shopping Network

name: HoverChat
long_description:
HoverChat is an app focused on making messaging more of a multi-tasking experience and allow users to use the messaging service without interrupting their work flow.

The app is currently available on Android phones.
one_liner: Message without interrupting what you're doing

name: Move Loot
long_description:
Move Loot offers a much-needed service to individuals buying and selling used furniture. There is currently no option in the market that optimizes your time and money while offering this unique user-friendly experience. We realize that in order to avoid the hassle, you end up buying new... harming your wallet and the planet! 

Move Loot solves your dilemma by creating an online marketplace where users can post furniture to sell, find furniture to purchase, and select delivery personnel to complete the process.  Imagine online shopping meets ride-sharing meets an ice cream sandwich!
one_liner: Move Loot is the most convenient and economical way to buy and sell…

name: MadeSolid
long_description: MadeSolid is a hardware company that develops high-quality materials with 3D printing applications. With a team of experienced chemists and engineers, the MadeSolid develops functional materials for 3D Manufacturing real products. MadeSolid is based in Emeryville, California.
one_liner: Functional 3D printing materials.

name: Drive Pulse
long_description:
Drive Pulse is an innovative new device & iPhone app to manage & monitor your cars when you can't be there.

Your Drive Pulse plugs into your car's data port in seconds. Every car built after 1996 has an OBD-II data port under the dash. Plug in your Drive Pulse, install the app, and get started in just a few minutes.

Drive Pulse is always on and stays connected thanks to cellular technology and a data plan, similar to the one you have for your smartphone. As long as your car is in an area with adequate T-Mobile data coverage, you can enjoy the peace of mind knowing that your car is safe.
one_liner: Device tracks & monitors your car

name: Yumbin
long_description:
Yumbins are mobile POS-powered self-checkout markets that offer a curated mix of the highest quality and healthiest snacks, beverages and essentials to office employees. Think of us as the Square for self-checkout meets on-site mini-Whole Foods.

Vending is a stagnant $43 billion industry that has suffered from expensive proprietary hardware, onerous payment acceptance and limited (often wildly unhealthy) selection. We replace this hardware with lightweight software that enables customized product selection and seamless checkout. Offices no longer need to sully their breakrooms with unsightly machines selling stale snacks; rather, they can enjoy the clean and minimal retail look of our Yumbins chock full of delicious products. 

Initially, we are targeting workplaces where employees pay for snacks, which are the large majority of corporate offices and manufacturing facilities. 1.2M of these sites fall into our target market, of which roughly 50% have vending machines today.
one_liner: App replaces office vending.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Office Management

name: Dating Ring
long_description: We're a Y Combinator W'14 class. We use matchmakers to set up group dates. What Uber has done for transportation - we're doing for dating. Members can book high quality dates on their schedule with the click of a button. Dating Ring is live in NYC and SF and will be launching next in Boston and LA.
one_liner: In person matchmaking meets group dating. We do the work. You go on…

name: Threadable
long_description: Threadable is a mailing list management solution that makes group email less noisy and more actionable.
one_liner:
Mailing lists 2.0. 
Threadable makes group email less noisy and more…

name: Futureleague
long_description:
FutureLeague (previously known as Camperoo) teaches kids ages 6-12 engineering and programming with a focus on teamwork, creativity, and design thinking. Kids level up in skills while participating in hands-on projects to reach 100 hours of instruction, similar to going from white belt to black belt in martial arts. They also host corporate team building events with Fortune 500 companies to foster design thinking and innovation.

FutureLeague is a Y-Combinator backed startup based in SOMA, San Francisco.  Emmie Chang, CEO/ Founder, previously created the largest summer technology camp in Texas and math ed-tech software that was used in over 35 school districts serving hundreds of thousands of students.
one_liner: Engineering and Programming for Kids 6-12 with a focus on creativity,…

name: Awesometalk
long_description:
Awesometalk is based out of San Francisco. We provides simple, free video calling.

We are insanely focused on making communication simple. We don’t like logging in, remembering passwords, or teaching our parents how to use Skype. Don't suffer the "add me on Skype dance" anymore!
one_liner: Free video calling without the hassle.

name: SimpleHash
long_description:
We’re on a mission to organize the world of NFTs and digital assets.

SimpleHash allows web3 developers to query all NFT data from a single API. We index multiple blockchains, take care of edge cases, provide a rapid media CDN, and can be integrated in a few lines of code.

NFTs are the fastest growing space within web3, yet it’s still far too hard for developers to embed NFTs into their apps. With NFT activity moving across chains, and NFTs being used for an exploding number of use cases, this complexity is only growing.

We abstract away all this complexity, and allow our customers to focus on building best in class experiences for their end users. Join us if you're excited at being at the forefront of the NFT and web3 revolution.
one_liner: Multi-chain NFT API

name: BBy
long_description: BBy's condensing device turns milk into a fine powder that spares the biome leaving it biologically and immunologically active. This allows  hospitals to stop wasting precious nursing time defrosting milk for hours and milk wastage from discarding rules. Simply weigh the powder, add water, shake and serve. No more freezing, no more defrosting, only patient care. NICUs are time sensitive wards in the hospital, time is everything and yet nurses today continue to prepare frozen milk for infants in what's known as the milk shift. A shift where the nurse spends the day defrosting milk for the next shift of nurses. Our tech is now fully peer reviewed and published, yielding safe and reliable results in over 20 hospitals in the New York Tri-State. The company is headed by Vansh Langer MD, a physician (Windsor University, University of Chicago) and Blanca Aguilar Uscanga PhD, a Bioengineering/Food Science PhD (University of Guadalajara /Centro Universitario de Ciencias Exactas e Ingenierías (CUCEI)) team that has over 50 published works in the field between them and are experts in the science of infant nutrition. Vansh saw the immense need for a time critical solution in the NICU and helped solve the puzzle with Dra. Blanca and her team and decided to work together to: Nurture the Future.
one_liner: BBy powders breast milk that's immunologically active & lasts 6 months

name: WhiteLab Genomics
long_description: We have developed an AI platform enabling to accelerate the discovery and the design of genomic therapies such as Cell Therapies, RNA Therapies and DNA Therapies.
one_liner: Unleashing the potential of DNA and RNA based therapies using AI

name: TradeX
long_description:
TradeX is an exchange on future events, where you can trade on event outcomes that affect your everyday life. We are the world’s most simplified derivative exchange where you can simply trade on yes or no (whether an event will happen or not). 

TradeX allows people to trade on what matters to them. Examples: Climate change, transportation, currencies, GDP, omicron cases, inflation rate, movies launch, next president & much more.

Our USP: Allowing people to trade on what they know rather than studying company financials or worrying about market conditions. We are making opinions investable.

Our MOTO: What do you do with your opinion? Believe in it.
one_liner: Exchange to trade on future events.

name: Massdriver
long_description:
Massdriver helps engineering and operations teams build secure, production-ready internal developer platforms in minutes.

With over 50+ infrastructure components engineering teams can build golden paths quickly on Kubernetes, serverless, or VMs.

Get the flexibility product engineers need, with the auditing and security operations teams’ demand.

We handle all the boring parts of cloud operations like IAM, secrets, continuous deployment, alerting, and monitoring so your team can focus on the product.

Massdriver supports anti-lockin, by running in your cloud, and open-sourcing all of our infrastructure components.
one_liner: Deploy secure, scalable cloud infrastructure in minutes not days
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Reality Defender
long_description:
Reality Defender is a deepfake detection platform used by enterprises to flag fake users and fraudulent content (audio, video and images). Our API and web app provide real-time risk scoring, PDF report cards, email alerts and forensics review.
 
Customer Use Cases:
• Onboarding KYC (Ie. Anti-fraud to identify fraudulent users and materials)
• Content Moderation (Ie. Social media, e-commerce, marketplaces, dating, streaming)
• Disinformation Detection (Ie. News, defense, government)

HN AMA: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30766050
 
Website: http://realitydefender.com
 
Contact: founders@realitydefender.com
one_liner: Enterprise Deepfake Detection

name: Lizza
long_description: Lizza makes it easy for businesses to sell to their customers directly on social media platforms like Instagram or WhatsApp through its suite of products, including payments, shipping, messaging and marketing tools.
one_liner: The OS for social commerce businesses in LatAm.

name: Mono
long_description: We offer a corporate bank account that integrates with accounting, tax and payroll systems allowing SMEs owners in LatAm manage their business in just one place.
one_liner: A bank account that integrates LatAm SMEs' finances and operations.

name: NFTScoring
long_description:
NFTScoring is the place for you to discover, analyze and trade NFTs.
We give you the superpowers to understand the NFT market in any given moment, make the best decisions, and take faster actions.
one_liner: NFT Trading Platform

name: CrediBook
long_description:
CrediBook digitizes the MSMEs' supply chain, from wholesale to retail, through online wholesale and bookkeeping operation system.

Our online wholesale platform CrediMart aims to create an efficient inventory-sourcing. We provide online-ordering, Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL) payment method, and logistic support. We help our wholesale partners earn an additional daily income stream by 50%.

Our bookkeeping app CrediBook also enables MSMEs generate financial report in less than 5 minutes and proven to speed up users’ micro-loans process from financial institutions.
CrediBook strives to encourage more MSMEs to benefit digitalization from easy and efficient platforms that meet their needs.
one_liner: Faire for Indonesia

name: Remi Labs
all_locations: Salt Lake City, UT, USA; Remote
long_description:
What does the shopping experience of the future look like?

1) mobile-first
2) video-ready
3) lightning fast
4) easy for small teams to manage

We've worked across some of the largest e-commerce sites in the world and are ready to bring forward the newest iteration of shopping online.
one_liner: Mobile video shopping experiences for Shopify

name: Fresh Factory
long_description:
We are transforming eCommerce and Direct-to-Retail fulfillment for Businesses that sells Cold Chain products. 
Fresh Factory provides network of hyperlocal cold chain fulfillment centers, transportation, and equipped them with smart fulfillment management system that allows businesses to store, pick & pack, and deliver their products their consumers faster, better, and more efficient.
one_liner: Smart Cold Chain Fulfillment Platform
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Supply Chain and Logistics"]

name: Onboard.io
long_description: Onboard is a SaaS which automates & streamlines the customer onboarding & implementation process. Easily create dynamic launch plans (customized per customer), which are collaborative with clients and visible to all stakeholders.  Onboard is built for onboarding by a team that spent a better part of the last decade onboarding some of the worlds largest brands.
one_liner: Manage & automate customer onboarding and implementation

name: Seis
long_description:
Today we're the easiest way for our customers to get a bank account. 

Tomorrow we'll be the easiest way to get a credit card, auto loan, mortgage, etc. 

Our mission is to treat our customers as 1st class citizens and *end dial #2 for español*
one_liner: Banking 100% in Spanish for the 44 million US Spanish speakers

name: Bananas
long_description:
We are building Gorillas of Indonesia. Bananas is a grocery delivery startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia where you can order groceries and get it delivered in minutes. 

We do this by building tech-enabled micro-hubs (referred to as "dark stores") near high-density residential neighbourhoods in order to be able to deliver close to being instant.
one_liner: Groceries delivered in minutes.

name: Eventual
long_description:
Eventual is a data warehouse for images and video.

We are building an integrated development experience for data scientists and engineers to query, process and build applications on Complex Data (non-tabular data such as images, video, audio and 3D scans).

We are funded by investors such as Caffeinated Capital, Array.vc and top angels in the valley from Databricks, Meta and Lyft. Our team has deep expertise in high performance computing, big data technologies, cloud infrastructure and machine learning.
one_liner: Data Warehouse for Computer Vision

name: AiSupervision
long_description: We make the operating system to track, manage and improve production in factories with many workers. We automate what the best supervisors would do if they watched everything that’s happening inside your factory.
one_liner: The operating system for factory production lines

name: Phoenix Hydrogen
long_description: Phoenix Hydrogen is building the first commodity marketplace for hydrogen. This year, $9.5B in federal grants will fund the first hydrogen grids, but this ecosystem has no marketplace. We’re uniquely able to build one because we’re already working with big utilities on a fulfillment platform: a 1000'-tall underground warehouse for hydrogen.
one_liner: First commodity marketplace for hydrogen.

name: Aigis
long_description: Aigis is a digital health insurance provider for the Indonesian market. We help companies to provide end-to-end healthcare benefits with simple clicks and fast processes.
one_liner: Indonesian digital health insurance provider

name: Flike
long_description: Flike is building ML Powered Recommender APIs. So we help engineers to personalize discovery pages, feeds, recommended content, customer communication, and more. We're backed by a strong set of executives from Google, GitHub, Airtable, etc.
one_liner: Recommender API.

name: Alima
long_description: Alima is a supply chain tech company that simplifies the way businesses procure fresh produce in Latin America. We help restaurants, CPG brands and retailers take care of planning their buying orders, ordering products, expense management, and logistics.
one_liner: Produce procurement made easy
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics

name: Vecindario
long_description: We make it easy for real estate developers in LATAM to sell new properties and close mortgages, unifying the experience, so home buyers  can buy a home in just a few steps and without the need to look for more intermediaries. We do it all online: selling homes and approving mortgages is 6x faster.
one_liner: We make it easier for real estate to sell properties and mortgages.
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate
industries: ["Real Estate and Construction", "Housing and Real Estate"]

name: Karate Labs
long_description: Karate is an open-source API & UI test automation framework. We have 6200 GitHub stars and used by dozens of F500 companies.
one_liner: Open-source API & UI test automation
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: HippoBuild
long_description:
Hippo Build is building the Operating System for the Construction industry.   
We automate and optimize back office functions and the supply chain of Small and Medium Construction Companies. We save our customers hours everyday, and 1000’s of dollars every month on better sourced materials. And it takes only minutes for them to onboard

We charge a small SaaS fee, + 1% transaction fee for the materials sourced. We are integrated with multiple marketplaces and providers, letting us automatically source better priced materials. This allows us to stay affordable for the SMB, whilst earning $20-100K per company.
one_liner: The Operating System of the construction industry

name: Pantore
long_description: Pantore is shortening the ingredient supply chain by connecting restaurants directly to wholesalers and food manufacturers, helping them save thousands of dollars every month.
one_liner: Platform for restaurants to order groceries in Brazil

name: beU delivery
long_description: beU delivery is an on-demand food delivery service in Africa. We offer a great selection of local restaurants and door-to-door food delivery that allows the customer to have their favorite food from the comfort of their home or office. We are the #1 food delivery service in Ethiopia, 67% cheaper than the competition, making food delivery affordable for the mass. We plan to expand our services to new markets and eventually become the super APP of Africa.
one_liner: Food delivery service in Africa

name: GAVEL
long_description:
Gavel is a live shopping marketplace for retailers in the EU, starting with comic stores. We allow shop owners to turn their offline store into a live and interactive online store within a couple of seconds. With our passion for technology, we build the best platform to connect, buy and sell with and from each other.

👉 Check out our app on the Apple App Store and Google Play Store.

Being part of GAVEL is more than a job — it’s a journey. Working in a fast-growing startup that has a fundamental impact on e-commerce. Regular online stores don't cut it anymore. Gavel is here to change that. Long live live shopping 🔥

This is your chance to be part of something big right from the very beginning. So roll up your sleeves and get involved 💪
one_liner: Live shopping marketplace

name: Cofactr
long_description:
Cofactr believes hardware should be as agile and scalable as software. We’re leveraging better data and AI to build best-in-class tools for electronics supply chain management. Cofactr is a single platform for procurement, purchase and management of electronic components that works seamlessly with integrated logistics to assure that the physical management of electronics parts is always responsible and efficient.

We're a Y Combinator W22 company with growing revenue and backed with significant venture funding from VCs like Bain Capital Ventures.
one_liner: The automated electronics supply chain platform for hardware teams
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Supply Chain and Logistics"]

name: SixWheel
long_description: SixWheel makes diesel trucks hybrid-electric in 3 minutes at zero upfront cost while delivering $25k more profit per truck annually.
one_liner: Make diesel semi trucks hybrid-electric

name: KorrAI
all_locations: Halifax Regional Municipality, NS, Canada; Remote
long_description:
There is an overwhelming need and limited supply of new energy sources, and the road to a low carbon future will be built by the mining industry. KorrAI offers solutions companies can implement now to reduce operational costs, mitigate risks, and optimize mining processes, allowing them to identify and produce essential resources in shorter timeframes and with greater environmental and social responsibility.

Our cloud-based platform is designed with users in mind, enabling seamless data management and sustainable exploration practices. We provide a dynamic, 3D representation of a site to help companies understand and make informed decisions about their project that will lead to more profitable and safer operations.
one_liner: Digital twins for the natural resources sector

name: Pina Earth
long_description: Pina Earth is building a suite of digital tools for data collection, monitoring, and certification of forest carbon projects. EU forests are at high risk due to climate change. With Pina Earth, forest owners can start high-quality carbon projects on their properties and use the new income stream to prepare their forests for a changing climate. Founded only last year, the startup already has active pilot projects on over 1,000 hectare (∼2,500 acres) in Germany. The founders met at CDTM and joined their expertise in sustainability science, software engineering, and machine learning to help EU forests.
one_liner: Unlocking carbon markets for European forest owners

name: Beyond Aero
long_description: Beyond Aero is making long range electric aircraft possible using hydrogen-electric propulsion. Our first aircraft is a zero emission private aircraft (6-9 seat), designed for hydrogen propulsion, flying 1,000 miles in range. We have $360M in LOIs from airlines and private jet owners. The company was founded by three aerospace engineers and serial entrepreneurs who are building the first human scale 2 seat hydrogen aircraft demonstrator (60kW), flying this summer. We have an engineering team of 10 engineers from Airbus, Safran and Lilium. We’ve previously raised $3M including non-dilutive support from the French government and among existing investors are the son of the Dassault Family and the former CEO of AirFrance.
one_liner: Zero-emission private aircraft using hydrogen-electric propulsion

name: Chula.ai
one_liner: Chula uses AI to create charts, graphs, diagrams and more in seconds.

name: Origami Therapeutics, Inc.
long_description: Origami Therapeutics, Inc. is a biotech company developing novel protein degraders with potential to delay or halt disease progression by eliminating toxic proteins from the body. Our drug discovery platform leverages our proprietary human disease models developed to select the small molecules with the best chance of clinical success. Our first indication is Huntington’s disease, a debilitating, progressive and ultimately fatal disorder caused by a genetic mutation. We have already identified small molecules that reduce the toxic mutated protein, suppress mutant protein-induced toxicities in human disease neurons and get into the brain. We anticipate that this approach will be broadly applicable to traditionally “undruggable” targets in other neurological diseases.
one_liner: Oral drugs to halt neurodegeneration

name: Cinapse
long_description: Cinapse makes it easy for a film or television crew to manage tens of thousands of digital production documents and daily workflows. We do this by providing one simple app that all crew, cast, and office staff can use on Web, iOS, and Android.
one_liner: The Operating System of Hollywood

name: AirMyne
long_description: We are building a machine to capture & remove CO2 from air at industrial scale to help companies & organizations hit their Net Zero targets.
one_liner: CO2 removal from air at industrial scale

name: CloudEagle.ai
long_description:
CloudEagle helps Finance, IT & procurement teams save on software spend and help streamline the renewal and buying process. Our customers save 10-30% on their existing spend and hundreds of hours renewing and buying new apps. 

- Your single system of record for all things “SaaS Vendors”
    --> Contract renewal reminders & cost optimization alerts
    --> Cross-team workflows for renewing and buying apps
    --> Personalized vendor recommendations, better than G2 and Gartner
    --> Expert negotiations on your behalf
one_liner: SaaS Procurement and Optimization Platform

name: Mooji Meats
long_description: Mooji Meats textures plant-based meat and cultured meat - think of turning ground meat into an authentic steak. We build a highly scalable 3D printing process that overcomes today's trade-off between authentic textures and scalability. We close the gap in taste, look, feel, nutrition, cost between meat mimics and real meat, tapping into an $1 trillion market opportunity.
one_liner: Enabling the next generation of alternative meats

name: Poko
long_description:
We replace traditional companies with DAOs for cross-border business and project collaborations. Instead of setting up your next project or company as a limited liability company, we enable you to set it up as a DAO supported by a legal infrastructure for "real-world" company interactions. 

For many projects in the informal economy or in jurisdictions with high registration costs and lengthy licensing times, or those with global collaborators, our DAOs help people take company setup from 90 days to 90s, getting them started on raising funds and building the future right away. We also provide a legal layer to enable high AUM DAOs to participate in global arbitration so their assets are better protected.
one_liner: Replace Traditional Companies with DAOs Globally

name: GoSats
long_description: GoSats is a bitcoin rewards app. We help people accumulate free bitcoin as cashbacks and rewards every time they shop in India.
one_liner: GoSats helps you earn free bitcoin when you shop in India.

name: Glocally
long_description:
We increase the customer retention of e-commerce shops by offering a high-quality same day and next day delivery with sustainable vehicles.
In Europe, 15B e-commerce parcels get delivered every year. This represents a market opportunity of $55B.
The founders Felix, Philip and Fabian met at university in 2016 and previously ran a profitable sneaker business together.
 🌱⚡️📦
one_liner: The last mile delivery service for e-commerce businesses in Europe.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Supply Chain and Logistics"]

name: Deall Jobs
former_names: ["SejutaCita (cc: A Million Dreams in Indonesian)", "SejutaCita", "UseDeall", "SejutaCita", "Deall SejutaCita", "Deall! SejutaCita", "Deall SejutaCita"]
all_locations: Jakarta, Jakarta, Indonesia; Singapore, Singapore; Remote
long_description: Deall is a curated job portal, where only the talents we have curated can apply to vacancies. 200+ companies who onboard us save time & money by seeing only eligible and top candidates for their vacancies. Job seekers love us because they can apply to multiple top companies with one click & get responses 21X faster.
one_liner: A job portal where companies see only curated top talents
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Recruiting and Talent

name: Impossible Metals
all_locations: Pasadena, CA, USA; Collingwood, ON, Canada; Remote
long_description:
Impossible mining is building underwater robotics vehicles which collect battery metals from the seabed without harming the environment. We have $500M+ in off-take LoI’s and have signed a partnership with a global offshore logistics company which holds a seabed mining exploration permit. We have also built the 1st PoC underwater robotic arm.

Polymetallic nodules are rocks which are rich in critical battery metals. Specially nickel, cobalt, manganese and copper. These metals are the the most expensive part of EVs.
one_liner: Underwater robotic vehicles that collect  battery metals responsibly

name: Trusty
long_description: 1 in 5 homes sell off-market, where agents have a stranglehold on access to the inventory. Trusty brings transparency to the market by letting homeowners privately indicate their intent to sell, then present offers from matching qualified buyers.
one_liner: Private MLS for off-market real estate
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate
industries: ["Real Estate and Construction", "Housing and Real Estate"]

name: Syncware
long_description:
Labor shortage is the biggest problem faced by warehouses right now.

Syncware helps warehouses operate with fewer people by levering AI to optimize various warehouse processes. They include:

- Shortening picking routes so warehouse workers need to walk less
- Optimizing the warehouse layouts, again to reduce travel time
- Improving space utilization 
- Smart slotting (make popular products more accessible) 

Syncware integrates directly with any warehouse management software.
one_liner: Helping warehouses optimize operations with AI
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Supply Chain and Logistics"]

name: TAI
long_description:
TAI is an investing app that helps millennial investors trade and manage all their existing accounts from a single app. 

TAI uses algorithms and market themes to help users discover actionable insights on how to improve their portfolios using ETFs.
one_liner: Control All of Your Investments from a Single App

name: Circular
long_description:
Circular is accelerating the adoption of the circular economy by making subscriptions the best way to access and experience tech: from smartphones, laptops, and headphones to gaming, VR and wearables.

Our customers get their hands on the best tech through low-cost, convenient subscriptions. They can pay monthly, keep it as long as they want, and if they love it, buy it. If they return it, we carefully refurbish it and pass it on to the next loving owner - radically extending its useful life.
one_liner: Subscription consumer electronics for Asia

name: Powerhouse AI
long_description:
It’s our vision to make anything in a warehouse SEE and THINK. From people to drones, to robots and CCTV’s. We aim to enable them to track, handle, and verify any type of good, because doing that efficiently is what warehousing is all about. 

We’re taking the first step with our AI-based phone application that enables warehouse operators to automatically verify and count warehouse inventory. The operator simply needs to take pictures.
one_liner: Automating warehouse inventory checks, with a phone
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Supply Chain and Logistics"]

name: HelloGuru
long_description: HelloGuru makes it easy for non-technical teams to consolidate all customer data into existing business systems. We do this by providing a No-Code UI where users sync their data from data warehouses to business tools such as Salesforce, HubSpot, or Intercom.
one_liner: Sync data from data warehouses to business systems

name: GIMO
long_description: We are building a new financial platform that helps underbanked workers get paid as they earn it, anytime, anywhere. By partnering up with corporate employers, GIMO is providing a mobile financial application as a benefit to their employees, aiming at changing the way the employees earn, spend, save and invest.
one_liner: We help underbanked workers get paid before payday

name: Olympian Motors
long_description:
Olympian Motors is a disruptive electric vehicle company. We are building minimalistic Electric Vehicles, based on a super-modular drivetrain/electronics architecture, combined with a new decentralized manufacturing model.

•  Received 182 pre-orders for Olympian Model O1  ($16M+ pre-booked revenue)
•  Disruptive, super-modular EV architecture: We simplified drivetrain & vehicle electronics, and reduced the semiconductor/ECU complexity, and developed proprietary magnetic blocks to simplify car assembly process.
•  Decentralized production model: Olympian designed a novel production model that allows decentralized-localized manufacturing of Olympian vehicles across the U.S. Olympian's production lead time is 70% shorter than legacy automakers. We minimized costly hardware, tooling, fitment and labor expenses. 
•  Rapid go-to-market: We aim to deliver the first Olympian O1 EVs by Q4/2022. We don't waste time and resources, unlike other EV companies. (It took 9+ years for Lucid and 11+ years for Rivian to make their first commercial shipment).
•  Very competitive battery efficiency in urban areas (Olympian early prototypes achieved slightly better miles/kwh efficiency than Tesla Model 3 and Rivian).
•  We use carbon-sequestered and recyclable materials for +7% of vehicle components.

At Olympian, we prioritize:
- Minimalism 
- Aesthetics
- Simplified cockpit and infotainment system
- Recyclable and carbon-sequestered materials

We aim to change today’s standardized and banal car experience, minimalize the design, simplify driver UX and over-complicated dashboard. Olympian Motors will create a new ‘experience-first’ consumer segment in the automotive.

Minimalistic. Aesthetic. Electric. Refined.
one_liner: Minimalistic electric vehicles with a decentralized production model

name: Netmaker
long_description: Netmaker is an open source virtual networking platform based on WireGuard. With Netmaker, you can bridge, clouds, the edge, IoT devices, and Kubernetes clusters. Netmaker provides the fastest possible virtual networks, with an average speed 10x faster than standard alternatives. Think of Netmaker like your VPC for distributed systems.
one_liner: Automated WireGuard networks for distributed systems and Kubernetes

name: Cashmere
long_description: Cashmere is a multisig solana wallet for enterprises to manage their digital assets. Instead of running their business from one person’s wallet, startups can use our wallet to securely manage their funds.
one_liner: Crypto wallet for web3 startups

name: Pigeon Loans
long_description:
Pigeon Loans is a relationship based technology platform that facilitates the creation and management of loans between friends, family, loved ones, and anyone who trusts one another.

By providing smarter ways for people to mix money with their relationships, Pigeon Loans seeks to empower individuals to borrow and lend money with the people they trust.
one_liner: Simplifying loans with your friends & family.

name: The Ankler
long_description: The Ankler is subscription news for the entertainment industry so good that everyone from CEOs to creators pay to consume it every day.
one_liner: Subscription entertainment news

name: Darsel
long_description: Darsel is a AI-powered math education chatbot which is designed to supplement K12 education systems in resource-constrained environments. Darsel allows students to practice math questions & do their homework through platforms like SMS, WhatsApp and Facebook Messenger.
one_liner: Chatbot teaching K12 math in developing countries

name: Verdn
long_description:
Verdn is a climate-impact API for companies and their end-customers. 

With Verdn, companies direct a portion of sales towards ecosystem restoration projects (like tree planting, ocean-plastic cleanup, and coral planting), carried out by vetted NGO partners. After each sale, we send the end-customer a tracking dashboard where they can engage with updates about their positive impact.

Our mission is to Ctrl+Z global ecosystem collapse by making sustainability profitable. We have planted 750,000 trees, recovered 200,000 kg of ocean-bound plastic, and have over 100+ paying customers that are seeing a 10x boost in engagement.
one_liner: An API to bundle trackable climate donations with any transaction.

name: Heptabase
long_description:
Heptabase is a visual note-taking tool that helps you learn complex topics. Think about when Notion and Figma have a baby — you can put your notes on whiteboards to record your thinking process. When you search for a note in the future, you can find the whiteboards it appears on to remember how you think with perfect visual memory.

Heptabase is backed by Y Combinator, HOF Capital, Kleiner Perkins, Moving Capital, Tonic Fund, and other investors, including the founders of Socialcam, Triplebyte, Codementor, and more.
one_liner: The visual note-taking tool for learning complex topics.

name: Reviving Mind
long_description:
Navigating chronic illness is an isolating and lonely process which ultimately reduces medical adherence and adversely impacts outcomes. There are over 100 deadly chronic conditions as 1 out of 2 Americans is currently living with at least 1 chronic condition. The US healthcare system has over $1 trillion dollars in direct costs. Medical adherence rates for therapeutic programs and medicine are only 50% because patients feel lonely, isolated, and unsupported in their chronic illness journey.

Reviving Mind is an in-network telehealth provider that improves clinical outcomes and program adherence for the senior medicare and medicare-advantage population that is plagued with loneliness and chronic illness. This is done through a novel and proprietary clinical program and technology platform that integrates virtual, private, curated, and professionally led groups that scale up to 8-patients with individualized and goal oriented lifestyle medicine coaching that is automated but managed by a licensed provider.

Scaling rapidly across the United States.
one_liner: Addressing Loneliness and Isolation for Seniors

name: Anja Health
long_description: Helping pregnant parents save the most personal source of stem cells - from their umbilical cord and placenta - to unlock future disease treatments
one_liner: The First Stem Cell Safe

name: Koko
long_description:
We provide free digital mental health technologies for millions of people struggling online — particularly young people. 

For example, we partner with online communities to help find and treat at-risk individuals directly on their platform using our online interventions.
one_liner: Making mental health accessible to everyone.

name: 10 minute squad
long_description: '10 minute squad' delivers groceries/alcohols in 10 minutes in Korea.
one_liner: GoPuff  for Korea

name: Finku
long_description: We allow our users to create a single view of their finances from 22 banks, investment platforms and e-wallets to help them get control of their finances. We offer the most comprehensive account integrations and personal finance tools in Indonesia.
one_liner: Personal finance platform for Indonesia

name: Plover Parametrics
long_description:
The insurance industry struggles to insure new risks like climate change. The amount of climate risk that goes uninsured every year is $180 billion and growing. 

Plover's software platform enables insurers to design new insurance products quicker and manage policies cheaper, unlocking new risk markets and geographies.

Plover's team previously worked together at Palantir, handling data infrastructure for the US Department of Defense.
one_liner: Climate change insurance that pays out immediately.

name: Avocademy
long_description: Avocademy was born from a need for more diverse designers. Current design programs are expensive and not accessible. We make it accessible for anyone to break into the field and change careers. Our students are 75% women, 65% BIPOC, & 33% LGBTQ+.
one_liner: We teach UX/UI design and then help people get great jobs.

name: Mahaana Wealth
all_locations: Islamabad, Islamabad Capital Territory, Pakistan; Remote
long_description: Pakistan has 401K style schemes for retirement but only 0.02% people have retirement accounts. Previously unallowed, Digital onboarding & KYC was adopted by the regulator in late 2021. We are the first & only licensed digital investment advisor and looking to take advantage of this regulatory tailwind. We are now licensed to create our own retirement funds & ETFs just like Vanguard
one_liner: Mahaana is first & only licensed digital wealth manager in Pakistan

name: Dumme
one_liner: Search through video

name: Marathon Education
all_locations: Remote; Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
long_description:
Marathon Education provides live interactive tutoring classes to K-12 students in Vietnam, we're the fastest-growing edtech player disrupting the $5bn offline tutoring market by allowing students to learn online with the best teachers in large-class or small-class format.

The company is founded by Duc, former education private equity investor at TPG Capital - where Duc invested in K-12 education and edtech businesses in Vietnam & Southeast Asia. Duc co-founded Marathon with Tung - serial tech entrepreneur in Vietnam who grew his last startup - Christina's to 500 employees across 8 cities.
one_liner: We provide live after-school tutoring to K-12 students in Vietnam

name: Workflow86
all_locations: Remote; San Francisco, CA, USA; Sydney, NSW, Australia
long_description:
Workflow86 is an all-in-one platform for documenting, automating and scaling your team’s internal business processes and workflows. 

You use drag and drop components to document and build out your process step by step with modules like forms, business logic, document templates and more. It's no-code, so non-technical team members (bizops, HR, admin, legal, risk and compliance) can set up playbooks and processes on their own.

With Workflow86, teams are able to document and codify their workflows in one central place, massively scale their operational capacity without additional hires, and consolidate fragmented processes into one platform. 

Start building for free at app.workflow86.com
one_liner: Document, automate and manage your most important business processes

name: Moneytree
long_description: Moneytree is an end-to-end platform that makes adding solar (+ battery storage) to a rental property as easy as adding coin laundry. With Moneytree, rental property owners earn guaranteed monthly returns on solar without taking on any new headaches or maintenance, while their renters get access to cheaper, cleaner renewable energy. A rental property owner with ten units can increase net operating income by $10,000+ per year, while saving each renter $100 or more on their energy bills.
one_liner: Unlocking solar for rental properties

name: WANTD
long_description: WANTD is the first sneaker marketplace built specifically for power resellers, who hold 80% of the secondary sneaker market supply. These power sellers are looking for ways to bulk manage their inventory while preserving their brand identity online, helping them move inventory quickly and efficiently. WANTD provides a platform for live video auctions, virtual storefronts, and bulk listing tools so that these resellers can move inventory in minutes, not weeks, and earn profits 45% higher than existing marketplaces. We launched our marketplace and one-click listing service for power sellers 4 weeks ago and have already done more than $100K GMV, growing 85% MoM. WANTD is backed by Slow Ventures, Hedgebay, and Y-Combinator (W22).
one_liner: The first sneaker marketplace built for power resellers

name: Humand
long_description:
At Humand we help companies digitize their internal communication, culture, and HR within one friendly app.

Humand centralizes and allows:
+ Internal social network 📲
+ Forms 📄
+ Surveys 📝
+ Files 🗂️
+ Digital magazine 📰
+ Recognitions 🤩
+ Training 📚
+ Complete profiles 📲
+ Chat ⌨️
+ Tickets and inquiries ❗❓
+ Payslips 💵
+ Onboarding 📆
+ Benefits 😀

More than 70 companies use Humand. Implemented by ArcelorMittal (biggest steel producer in the world), Tenaris (global leader in steel pipes production), NSG group (among the biggest glass producers in the world), and many other organizations across different countries.

We enable all workers, especially those who do not work at a desk with direct access to a computer, to be connected with your company. Humand helps to improve internal communication speed, the flow of information between collaborators, and allows to have instant and targeted reach to all employees with push notifications.

It generates a digital community of your company that improves the working environment, where employees have a greater sense of belonging, are truly connected and collaborate.
one_liner: Creating digital communities for companies
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: 1Flow
long_description: 1Flow is building a user engagement layer for all apps on mobile and web to help companies increase conversion and reduce churn at scale – starting with in-product user feedback collection. Our first product is a flexible tech platform to collect in-product user feedback, that directly feeds into product development so you can know why churn and conversion happen, and launch features that will have a direct ROI to a company’s bottom line.
one_liner: In-the-moment user feedback for mobile and web apps to unlock growth.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Unravel Carbon
long_description: Unravel Carbon is  an enterprise software that helps companies track and reduce their carbon emissions, focusing on Asia, based in Singapore. It is the first AI-powered decarbonization platform in Asia that converts any company’s accounting data into full supply chain carbon data in seconds, generates climate solutions automatically and auto-populates regulatory disclosure reports. PropertyGuru, a Unicorn in Asia, is already using us to achieve their climate goals.
one_liner: Enterprise software for companies to track & reduce their carbon…

name: RTHM
long_description:
RTHM provides virtual-first care for complex illness, starting with Long COVID.  Most Long COVID clinics focus on teaching patients how to better cope with symptoms, which is helpful, but we don’t stop there.  We develop collaborations & partnerships so our patients access to the most promising root-cause directed early therapies for Long COVID.

In conjunction with clinical care, RTHM operates a clinical lab and collects deep molecular data to develop AI-powered diagnostics and better ways of predicting which treatments may work best for whom.
one_liner: Telehealth and at-home diagnostics for Long COVID

name: Rally
long_description: Rally is a User Research CRM that makes it easy for teams to do research with their users. By automating outreach, scheduling, incentives, and participant management, Rally replaces messy spreadsheets and disjointed tooling, saving teams hours each week.
one_liner: User Research CRM
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Discz Music
long_description:
Discz is where Gen Z comes to discover and share music. We’ve topped the Appstore charts globally and have over 1 million songs being discovered and saved to personal playlists every week. We also have a 4.9 rating in the iOS app store with over 20K reviews globally.

This is just the start of what we have planned.
one_liner: The hottest new social media and music app

name: Arpari
long_description: The treasury management platform built for commercial real estate. Seamlessly consolidate portfolio finances and manage financial operations in one-place. Join the CRE finance teams improving their workflows with Arpari.
one_liner: Treasury management built for CRE

name: Fleek
long_description: Fleek is a B2B Wholesale Marketplace for second-hand fashion. Our buyers are vintage stores and online resellers; our suppliers are used clothing wholesalers, rag-houses, and donation centres.
one_liner: A B2B marketplace for wholesale second hand fashion

name: yhangry
long_description:
Yhangry is a private chef marketplace, where you can book a chef whenever you want to socialise at home.

For $40pp, you can book a 3-course feast in just a few clicks. On the supply side, we help chefs earn 3 times as much as working in a restaurant.
one_liner: Marketplace for private chefs

name: GoJom
long_description: GoJom is a One Stop Shop for Real Estate Solutions. It’s technology creates a  faster and easier way to buy, sell and rent properties in LaTam.
one_liner: One-stop-shop for Real Estate Solutions.

name: Ploomber
long_description: We are building a cloud platform to help data scientists develop and deploy projects without a dedicated engineering team to support them.
one_liner: Heroku for Data Science.

name: Float Health
long_description: Float brings a nurse to your home when you’re sick. If you have a chronic illness, instead of making you come to an overcrowded hospital full of sick people, we bring the best of the hospital to you.
one_liner: Uber for Nurses

name: amiloz
long_description: Corner-stores can order their inventory (milk, sugar, beer, soups etc.) on an app and have it delivered to their store the very next day. They can also get access to credit to finance the inventory purchases. This is a 100B+ market in LatAm. We are starting in Mexico City but we will be a LatAm wide company over time.
one_liner: We enable Latin American corner-stores procure inventory easily
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Supply Chain and Logistics"]

name: Winter
long_description:
Winter offers an embeddable checkout widget for businesses & NFT projects to sell NFTs through a credit card! We also help custody & manage a user's NFT if they don't have a wallet.

Imagine "Stripe for NFTs"

Try a demo at http://usewinter.com/demo
Interested in partnering or using Winter? Email us at sales@usewinter.com
one_liner: Checkout to sell NFTs via credit card

name: Shaped
long_description:
Shaped helps software companies increase engagement for feeds, recommendations and notifications using machine-learning. By providing an easy-to-use API, Shaped enables any engineer, even without ranking experience, to build machine-learning into their product. The best thing about Shaped is that it understands unstructured data, allowing businesses to get started no matter how their data is organized.

The team behind Shaped built the ranking models that power Facebook.
one_liner: APIs for ranking

name: Rider
long_description: Rider is building modern parcel delivery for online sellers in Pakistan. We are doing $130K in monthly revenue, delivering 200K orders per month across 60 cities. Unlike traditional logistics players, Rider’s solution is: Easier to use (integration with shipper portals, delivery agent app, end- customer app); Quicker (route optimization, next day deliveries, 24-hour cash repayment); Transparent (resolves ‘fake attempt’ deliveries, offers live tracking) and Flexible (shipper and customer control on delivery location and times).
one_liner: Modern parcel delivery for online sellers in Pakistan.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Supply Chain and Logistics"]

name: ngrow.ai
long_description:
AI-driven push marketing tool for mobile apps, that can be integrated in hours, without any code writing.

nGrow connects to behavioral data from analytical systems like Amplitude, Google Firebase, Mixpanel etc. and allows to setup auto push campaigns with an hours.

It's as simple as running  Google or Facebook but in push notifications channel. 
nGrow.ai customers usually got their up to 30% incremental Revenue lift.

We got Amplitude COO and ex-Google advisors on board
one_liner: Low-code SaaS for marketing in push notifications

name: Winno
long_description: 💬  Text your fans. 🔒 Own your audience. 💸 Get paid for what you love.
one_liner: Paid text message communities for creators.

name: Vobi
long_description:
Vobi is a project management platform for small construction businesses, like home remodeling companies, contractors, architects, and interior designers.

We help them save up to 50% of their time spent on manual work, mainly on the procurement and estimation processes, so they have more time to focus on their core activities. Through Vobi, they can manage projects from start to finish, collaborate with their customers, plan, quote, and make purchases or payments to suppliers, all in one place. No more spreadsheets and papers!
one_liner: All-in-one project management software for construction SMBs in Latam

name: Clupp
long_description:
We offer up to 40% lower premium by focusing on the population which are either low mileage drivers or have good driving habits, representing a $7B market.
Insurance penetration in LatAm is extremely low (30% for cars & 10% for motorcycles). This is because there is not an appropriate product for most vehicles (price, payment options, and distribution channels, etc.). We developed the tech to identify and offer affordable insurance for any vehicle (cars, motorcycles, bikes, scooters) based on mileage and driving habits. Then we added gamification, payment options for the unbanked population, and more.
one_liner: Online insurer with affordable insurance for low risk drivers in Latam

name: QUIK
long_description:
QUIK is the Super App for LatAm, letting customers order food, groceries and goods and get them in 30 minutes, while  providing users and businesses with a stable coin wallet they can use to pay, save money, and avoid currency risks.

Users can use QUIK Super App not only to buy goods directly and have them delivery by QUIK logistics team, but also to pay in the business by scanning a QR code. They can also transfer money between themselves, pay their services, all from one single App.
one_liner: The Super App for LatAm

name: Unsaddl
long_description: Unsaddl enables employers to offer education benefits including student loan contributions, 529 plans, and tuition reimbursement.
one_liner: Education benefits for a modern workforce
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: WishRoll
one_liner: Send songs to your friends' homescreens

name: SOTERI SKIN
long_description:
Soteri Skin is D2C skincare for chronic skin conditions like eczema. We’re the only non-prescription product proven to provide long-lasting relief for the 30 million Americans who suffer from eczema.

How it works:
Skin surface pH is constantly in flux, and many of your daily activities can throw it out of balance. People with chronic skin conditions such as eczema have a harder time regulating their skin's pH. 

Soteri's patented pH/LOCK™ locks skin in at a therapeutic pH for 12+ hours, which is shown to help break the cycle of skin sensitivity, whether you have eczema, psoriasis, or just a bad sunburn.

Our formulations are aesthetically elegant (non-sticky, sit well under makeup, etc), safe for anyone to use, and don't require a prescription. Most people see skin health improvements within the first few weeks of application, even for tricky, chronic skin conditions like eczema and psoriasis.

With Soteri Skin, anyone can enjoy healthy, glowing, pH-enomenal skin!
one_liner: D2C Skincare for Eczema

name: Decent
long_description: Decent enables musicians to monetize their work directly through their fans, aligning artist & fan incentives to reinvent funding, IP protection, and discovery.  We do this through a marketplace and infrastructure that enables musicians to issue NFTs collateralized by their royalties.
one_liner: Enabling fans to invest in artists & share in their success.

name: Drifting in Space
long_description:
We are a platform for high-performance browser-based applications. We make it easier for developers to deploy apps that give every user a dedicated backend.

This is a system design that apps like Figma and GitHub codespaces use, but it's currently difficult for others to replicate it. We make it as easy as deploying a traditional web server.
one_liner: Run compute-intensive apps in a browser
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Spade
long_description: Spade is a universal transaction enrichment API. With a single API call we take raw transaction data and add normalized merchant identities, categories, granular geo data, and more. We allow fintech companies to underwrite, identify fraud, understand their customers, and build faster than ever before.
one_liner: Universal financial transaction data enrichment
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Fogbender
long_description:
Fogbender helps B2B companies support customer teams: think Intercom meets Slack's shared channels.

Today, all customer software is explicitly or implicitly designed for helping individuals, not teams. This is forcing B2B companies - who sell products to teams, not individuals - to augment their default customer support platform (Zendesk, Intercom, Front, etc) with a second, "unofficial", system: Slack's shared channels.

This causes a number of operational and logistical difficulties for both vendors and their customers, resulting in added costs, inefficiencies, and lost opportunities.

With Fogbender, B2B vendors embed a team-to-team messaging widget directly on their customer dashboard, where all users belonging to an account can - with no additional authentication - 1) see a list of currently-open issues 2) participate in conversations with their own team and the vendor, and 3) search all historical discussions.
one_liner: Customer support tool purpose-built for companies that sell APIs

name: PropelAuth
long_description:
PropelAuth provides the right level of authentication for all stages of a company. New startups can use our hosted pre-built UIs which provide the simplest possible integration. Out of the box, our customers immediately have the same auth experience as large tech companies like Slack. As those startups grow, they can use our APIs and component libraries to pull aspects of the experience into their product.

More than just authentication, we will also provide useful functions tied to a "user" or "organization", like analytics, billing/subscriptions, referral programs, etc.
one_liner: Team-based authentication for B2B SaaS
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Yatima Inc.
long_description: Yatima is a verifiable computing platform which uses formal proofs and zkSNARKs to make software safer.
one_liner: A verifiable computing platform

name: Topship
long_description:
Topship is the easiest way for African businesses to export/import cargo freight and parcels to their suppliers, distributors and customers.  We are building Flexport for Africa.

Our goal is to build a Global Distribution System that makes delivery of parcels, cargo and freight easy for African businesses.
one_liner: Flexport for African Merchants
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Supply Chain and Logistics"]

name: Amal Invest
long_description:
Amal's an investing app for Muslims. Muslims only invest in Shariah-compliant business, but it's hard to know which businesses are compliant. That's because it's based on complex financial metrics that change over time. We take that burden away entirely.

Amal can filter stocks but also, remarkably, funds. Set your filters up once, and you'll have access to a universe of investments that cater to your specific requirements.
one_liner: Investing app for Muslims

name: SNAB
all_locations: Remote; Madrid, Community of Madrid, Spain
long_description: Snab aims to automate, digitize & simplify business payments & cash collections, as well as the treasury management of your business, all from one place, and in a safe manner.
one_liner: B2B Payments in "One Click"

name: Quan
long_description:
We provide a self-assessment which identifies the underlying causes of poor wellbeing and match proven solutions for individuals and teams.

https://www.quanwellbeing.com/
one_liner: End-to-end platform to improve wellbeing and team performance.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Attain
long_description:
Attain is a one-stop shop for convenience store owners to buy inventory across all their suppliers with higher reliability, price transparency, and product discovery.

On average, store owners buy products from over 10-15 different suppliers each week. This painful process involves shopping in massive warehouses or spending hours working with wholesaler’s sales representatives (who sometimes don’t even show up). As a result, stores waste countless hours ordering products through extremely inefficient and tedious processes. These store owners are also severely impacted by inventory shortages and revenue loss which many times results in them downsizing their business or shutting them down completely.

Attain solves this problem by providing a single app to purchase products across all of their suppliers, resulting in a one-stop shop for inventory. By aggregating inventory across a multitude of suppliers and wholesalers, Attain helps stores save significant time and money while allowing them to focus on what they do best - growing their businesses.

Feel free to reach out at founders@joinattain.com!
one_liner: One-Stop Shop for Convenience Store Inventory

name: Better Opinions
long_description:
Better Opinions is a prediction market of India which allows users to trade their opinion on everyday topics. For example, If you think India Covid cases will decrease by 10% this week, you can trade this insight and win money if correct.

Our aim is to make the app inclusive for all. The stock market unfortunately can be very technical and opaque and therefore isn’t always accessible for all. However, when we start allowing trading in categories such as cricket, politics and entertainment, not only do we make trading more relatable, but we also help improve their financial literacy.
one_liner: Prediction market of India

name: Forest
long_description: Forest (https://tryforest.com) is a full-service property manager for homeowners associations. We manage the community, provide neo-banking, maintain buildings, and help homeowners with their everyday needs.
one_liner: Digital property manager and neobank for homeowner associations.
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate
industries: ["Real Estate and Construction", "Housing and Real Estate"]

name: Nophin
long_description: Nophin is the financial platform for modern landlords. With FDIC-insured bank accounts and smart cards that help you categorize finances, Nophin is the easiest way for landlords to increase returns and invest profitably.
one_liner: The financial software and bank account built for landlords.

name: Venue.live
long_description:
Venue makes large remote meetings more fun and interactive. Companies like Shopify use Venue every day for Town Halls, Kickoffs, AMAs, and more.

We’re building Venue to be a place where teams can:

- Reflect their unique personality and culture.
- Create a vibe that’s fun, energizing, authentic and spontaneous.
- Provide a safe and inclusive space for colleagues to interact how they want to.

As a result, we’re seeing higher meeting attendance, better in-meeting engagement and remote team members that feel more energized and connected post meeting!

We'd love for you to try Venue at your next team-wide meeting. Let us know how we can help!
one_liner: Fun and interactive All Hands & AMAs for remote teams

name: Unai
long_description:
The first killer use case for VR will be virtual presence—not gaming. The world is going remote, but our ability to feel connected with each other is limited to our screens. Work, friends, and social lives are globalizing.
So we built a VR headset and virtual world made for human expression and connection. And it leapfrogs the industry.
one_liner: A VR headset designed to make virtual presence lifelike.

name: IoTFlows Inc
long_description:
We’re a cloud software that connects industrial machines to the cloud to improve manufacturing efficiency.
We have $170k in Annual Recurring Revenue from Stanley Black & Decker, U.S. Air Force, and Schlumberger.
They use us to get real-time visibility into their machines and operations. Previously, they either had no data or they had to rely on bad information from their operators, which could take weeks to get.
Founders have MSc & PhD from Georgia Tech focusing on real-time machine learning and built software for Delta Airlines and Caterpillar.
We have a $46B TAM, from over 1.3M qualified factories in the US & EU, with an average subscription of $36k/year/factory.
one_liner: Cloud Software Making Industrial Machines Smart

name: Trueplace
long_description: Trueplace invests with first-time homebuyers to purchase their dream home. We provide a portion of the down payment in exchange for a share of the future capital appreciation of the home.
one_liner: Making homeownership possible.
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate
industries: ["Real Estate and Construction", "Housing and Real Estate"]

name: Vessel
long_description:
Vessel is the universal API for CRMs. We make it easy for companies to integrate with their customers' CRMs. Our vision is to become Plaid for the GTM stack.

Over 90% of companies use a CRM as the system of record for their customers. Many products want to access this data, but the fragmented CRM market and engineering costs make it an expensive endeavor. 

Integrate with Vessel and never worry about building CRM integrations again. We provide a unified interface and schema which handles the nuances of reading and writing data across different CRMs.
one_liner: The Universal API for CRMs
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: CypherD Wallet
long_description: Crypto Wallets are currently too geeky for mainstream users. We are building CypherD Wallet to solve this and take the web3 browsing experience to mainstream users. We launched our beta app last month and the current wallet works for EVM chains and also has one of the world's first non-custodial crypto cards as an add-on. We also have built the world's cheapest EVM cross-chain bridge.
one_liner: Multi-Chain Crypto Wallet with a Crypto Debit Card

name: Joon
long_description: Joon is a subscription app for parents with ADHD kids that uses gamification to help their kids become more responsible and independent. It’s a video game, but kids only level up if they do productive activities in real-life (like chores, exercising, homework, and hundreds of others).
one_liner: The to-do app for kids with ADHD

name: Bracket
long_description: Bracket is the data pipeline between popular business tools and backend databases. When ops teams update data in Google Sheets or Airtable, and engineers update data in the database, Bracket connects the two sources to reflect the same information.
one_liner: Two-way syncs between business tools and your database
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: OurEye.ai
long_description: OurEye.ai lets any business with CCTV Cameras use computer vision to analyze their camera feeds automatically. For example, one of our customers is a retail outlet that uses OurEye.ai to monitor footfall and store cleanliness.
one_liner: OurEye.ai automatically analyses security cameras with Computer Vision

name: PINA
long_description:
At PINA, we are designing and building the future of personal finance with a mission to help everyone achieve financial freedom by providing products and advice that make complicated financial decisions simple and relevant. 

We seamlessly integrate money management and investing into one app to allow people to manage their finances holistically. Users can see their net worth, monthly cash flow and how their budget has changed over the past several months. All of this is automated and designed to help them achieve the savings goal which they have set .

In addition to money management, we focus on making investing easy with pre-built portfolios and automatic rebalancing. When you sign up for an account, it offers the option to pick an expertly built portfolio, or you can choose to build your own.
one_liner: WealthFront of Indonesia

name: Numida
long_description: Numida provides working capital loans to African micro businesses. Instead of borrowing from informal lenders or family, micro business owners download the Numida app, apply in minutes, and receive capital within a day. We have figured out how to score and disburse unsecured loans to cash-based businesses that have no digital transaction history, while maintaining excellent collection rates. Since 2021 we have provided $23M in working capital to 32,000 businesses in East Africa.
one_liner: Working capital for African micro businesses

name: Brainboard
long_description:
Brainboard is a collaborative solution for engineers to visually design & operate their Cloud infrastructures.
We help our customers to increase the build and delivery of their infrastructures x11 and speed up their onboarding by up to 70%.

Both technical profiles with 20+ years of combined expertise and after working together at a major French Cloud provider, Chafik and Jeremy launched Brainboard in 2019.
