one_liner: Visually design and manage cloud infrastructures.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: re-mint
long_description:
re-mint lets fashion brands set up official secondhand marketplaces so their customers can buy and sell directly with each other.

We help brands monetize their resale market. We offer revenue share on transaction fees and use the transaction data to drive new sales. For example, if an Everlane customer sells her jeans because they are too small, we retarget her to purchase the larger size from Everlane's main e-commerce website.
one_liner: official secondhand marketplaces for fashion brands

name: Nimbus
long_description: We deliver pre-configured cloud dev environments on lightning-fast cloud machines that can be managed centrally. This brings the speed, security, and flexibility of the cloud to help devs build better products.
one_liner: Frictionless and powerful cloud dev environments
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Andson Biotech
long_description: Andson Biotech helps pharmaceutical companies measure difficult to detect chemicals that they need to measure while developing and manufacturing drugs like cell-therapies or biologics. Drug companies want to use our technologies to get fast and accurate chemical measurements they do thousands of times per day for drug development and quality control.
one_liner: Fast chemical measurements for drug development and manufacturing

name: Neural Dynamics Technologies
long_description:
We create high-resolution, minimally invasive electrodes for sensing and stimulating neural activity within the brain with the goal of transforming the efficacy of deep brain stimulation (DBS), an FDA-approved therapy used to treat Parkinson’s, essential tremor and epilepsy. 

NDT's electrode leads are thinner than a human hair and unlike currently available DBS devices, our devices do not only stimulate, but also have many recordings sites, thereby enabling high-resolution, closed-loop recording and stimulation.
one_liner: High-resolution implantable electrodes for brain machine interfacing

name: Theneo
all_locations: New York, NY, USA; Seattle, WA, USA; Tbilisi, Tbilisi, Georgia; Remote
long_description: At Theneo we are generating Stripe-like API Docs in just a few clicks. We are working on automating the content generation process for developers so they can quickly generate high-quality API docs.
one_liner: Stripe-like API Docs in just a few clicks
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]
regions: ["United States of America", "Georgia", "America / Canada", "Middle East and North Africa", "Remote", "Partly Remote"]

name: Kula
long_description:
Kula is Shopify for law firms. Our software automates the business side of building a law firm, letting lawyers focus on the law. 

Since the start of the pandemic, the rate of growth in the number of US law firms has increased by 240%. The number of US law firms has increased by 13,000.

Our mission is to enable this revolution. We’re doing this together with an incredible set of early adopters. These lawyers are building their own law firms, after leaving world-leading organisations like Allen & Overy, Atrium, Carey Olson, Clifford Chance, Credit Suisse, IBM, K&L Gates, Fish & Richardson, Slaughter & May. Join us!
one_liner: Shopify for law firms

name: MutableAI
long_description: MutableAI is an AI native developer platform. We help developers move faster and collaborate with more ease using AI.
one_liner: AI Accelerated Software Development

name: HoyTrabajas
long_description: HoyTrabajas is The LinkedIn for low-skilled workers in Latin America. But instead of being a social network, we are a platform that allows users to exchange information about resumes and job openings in real-time. We also make companies recruit their low-skilled workers in less than 72 hours, saving at least 60% of money spent on recruiting, and 70% of their time looking for talents. We launched in October 2020. Currently, we have $185k MRR, growing +20% every month. Rubén, Vladimir, and Sebastián are technical co-founders and previously worked in the HR industry for a long time. HoyTrabajas is backed by Rebel Fund, Alan Rutledge, Kube Ventures, Flucas VC, Magic Fund, New Ventures, Y Combinator (w22), and more.
one_liner: LinkedIn for low-skilled workers in LATAM
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Bemlo
long_description: Through Bemlo, hiring healthcare staff takes 24 hours instead of three months. Nurses and doctors use Bemlo to keep updated on new opportunities in the ever-increasing pool of options. To find the best pay and the most exciting gigs, nurses and doctors work with up to 5 staffing agencies per year. This means keeping documents, preferences, availability and much more up to date. With Bemlo, they have one point of communication for all their work.
one_liner: Marketplace for hiring healthcare workers in Europe

name: Joe
long_description:
Joe is building a innovative and flexible DtoC Buy Now Pay Later App  in Europe powered by Tech📲.
In Europe, only 15% of e-commerce have integrated BNPL solutions and consumers don’t have access to installments very easily. 

Within Joe app and our virtual card you can buy now pay later on any store  without any technical integration. And if you already made your purchase, you can be refunded and get 3 installments
one_liner: We let customers "Buy Now Pay Later" on any store in Europe.

name: Rome
long_description: Rome is building a freight marketplace for truck drivers to find work, receive payments, and manage their business. Today, Rome helps 80+ drivers earn up to 40% more by accessing 10x more loads through scraping brokers/shippers. We’re looking to become the platform for all truck drivers and eventually own the layer between drivers and shippers.
one_liner: Google Flights for the $800B trucking industry
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Supply Chain and Logistics"]

name: Fello
long_description:
Fello is a game-based savings and investment application for the gen-z and young millennials of India to save play and earn returns more than a traditional savings bank account. We are merging the worlds of gaming and finance to make finance fun, easy and rewarding!

Users can save and invest in financial assets and for every rupee they save they get one gaming token using which they can play daily and weekly games and if they win in these games they get to win Rs.1 lakh every week!

Just within a short span of 12 weeks of launch, we onboarded 250,000 users with 92% of them being referred users, 88% of them being first-time investors who are spending over 12 minutes on an average per day on the app saving and playing games together!
one_liner: Grow money and win $1000 every week by saving and playing games

name: Telematica
long_description:
Telematica is an API and data platform for Electric Vehicles. With Telematica, companies can access telematics, battery, and other mobility data as well as remotely control EV charging with a single standardized API. 

Globally, the electric vehicle market is exploding. Particularly in India, where more than 40% of the new automobile sales are expected to be electric by 2030!

The thing that fascinates us is that virtually 100% of them are connected to the cloud, which captures and stores telematics, battery, and other mobility data. Unfortunately, there is no easy way for companies to interact with them as there is no user-friendly API or developer portal provided by any brand. For all of these vehicles, we create a single, standardized API.

Here are some immediate use cases we are powering:
1. Smart route planning, to reduce range anxiety and save money by optimizing battery usage for EV owners. 
2. Insurance companies use our telematics data to reward good drivers and also to assess battery degradation. 
3. Finally, fleets are electrifying, necessitating centralized and remote monitoring. Our API enables this transition by providing a unified interface for all vehicles irrespective of brand.

To sum up, the world is going electric and our API is going to power them all! 🚀
one_liner: Plaid for Electric Vehicles
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Vimmerse
long_description: Vimmerse provides a platform and SDKs that make it easy to create, share, and play 3D video. We enable businesses to offer real-world immersive experiences that feel like being there. We are domain experts with over 200+ patents in the field and are productizing our prior work inventing the MPEG immersive video coding standard. Vimmerse is the solution that makes realism possible in the metaverse.
one_liner: Platform and SDKs to create, share, and play 3D video
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Lifecast
long_description: We make tools for state-of-the-art 3D VR video, which fix motion sickness for a more comfortable and immersive experience. Our team's experience includes building VR cameras at Facebook, and robot perception systems at Lyft and Google X.
one_liner: Software to create 3D video for VR, robotics and film.

name: Duplo
one_liner: Venmo for B2B in Africa

name: Material Depot
long_description:
The problem - Material discovery today is a big pain for the design community

Countless hours are spent browsing to catalogues, visiting offline stores, coordinating with vendors for samples, getting quotations and finalizing materials. All of this process removes focus and causes hindrance to the process of design

The Solution - Discovery engine and AI design tools to make the process easy and seamless

We are building a digital library of materials across different categories with seamless search functionalities. On top that we are enabling the community with a image recognition tool and a digital mood board to embed the right material in the design
one_liner: Search Engine, workflow automation for Architectural & Design industry

name: SaveIN
long_description:
SaveIN is Buy now, Pay later for healthcare in India. We help Doctors, Dentists and Veterinarians to serve 50% more customers who are otherwise unable to avail private healthcare. 

Having launched in Jan this year, we already have over 400 healthcare providers in our network and have issued $75K in loans, growing at 20% weekly and earn 6% on the loan amount 

80% Indians have no health insurance and 50% Indians are unable to pay for private healthcare. We are targeting 100M urban Indians who undertake on an average 1 healthcare procedure per year costing $200. This is a $20B dollar market opportunity

The company is founded by Jitin Bhasin who is a second time fintech founder and has previously built profitable fintech lending startup with $7M in annual revenue. The team comes with over 40 years of experience in fintech, banking, technology and consulting

Our investors include Y-combinator, Soma Capital, Leonis VC, 10X Group, Pioneer Fund, Rebel Fund, Nordstar, Grant Park Ventures, MyAsiaVC, Kube VC, Leblon Capital, Almagro GmbH, Oliver Jung and other angels
one_liner: Buy now, Pay later for healthcare in India

name: DimOrder
long_description:
DimOrder - Restaurant POS system for Southeast Asia

Founded in 2019, DimOrder is a Hong Kong-based technology company transforming the F&B industry. In addition to online payments, we allow restaurants to market to their customers, order food from their suppliers, and receive short term loans. Through one single platform, restaurateurs can easily manage their business and focus on their passion, we let the chef be chef.
one_liner: Toast for Southeast Asia

name: Courtyard
long_description:
Courtyard stores physical collectibles (trading cards, sneakers, watches, etc.) in secured vaults, creates a 3D representation of the asset and mints it as an NFT on the blockchain. We’ve partnered with one of the largest security companies in the world to store collectibles.

Once the physical collectible has been received and tokenized by Courtyard, users can:

- Trade their NFT on any Ethereum compatible marketplace
- Hold their valued collections as NFTs and connect with other collectors 
- Burn their NFT on Courtyard’s website to redeem the underlying asset (Courtyard will ship redeemed collectibles in 150+ countries).
one_liner: Bringing physical collectibles to the blockchain.

name: Carbon Crusher
long_description:
We are crushing roads in need of maintenance, reusing the old road materials, replacing heavy oil with carbon binding lignin. This is both a cheaper, more durable and net carbon negative method, removing ~1.5 tonnes CO2 from the atmosphere from every 100 feet of road. 

We offer Crushing As A Service (CRAAS) to public and private road owners and refurbishers, and are already gaining international traction. Using satellite imagery, we will monitor road status and potential, and will offer additional tech and bio enhancements to make all roads green and a solution to the climate crisis.  

We are building the road to a carbon negative future.
one_liner: We make carbon negative roads

name: Nullstone
long_description:
Nullstone makes it easy to rapidly launch, scale, and maintain apps and workloads on AWS. 

We are filling the gap between Heroku and an in-house infrastructure team. We offer software teams a simple developer experience while keeping control of their own infrastructure.

Nullstone provides an extensive catalog of enterprise-grade software architectures that any developer can launch and operate. Additionally, a simple web interface and CLI allow a team to manage apps, datastores, and domains across multiple accounts and environments.
one_liner: Opinionated platform to launch/operate apps & workloads on AWS

name: Take App
long_description:
Take App makes WhatsApp ordering efficient. We let local stores build their own online sales channel to manage orders efficiently. 

Founder Youmin Kim is ex-Facebook Engineering Manager who launched Facebook Marketplace and Messaging Commerce in SE Asia. 

We are supporting more than 10K businesses from 30 countries.
one_liner: WhatsApp ordering made easy

name: BotCity
long_description:
The rise of Robotic Process Automation offered a promise that any business user can build automations. We were skeptical about that and decided to talk to users of platforms such as UiPath, Automation Anywhere, and Blueprism, all of them low-code.

Talking to users, we discovered that unique automations incorporating exclusive company processes and intelligence that have the potential to transform the business must be implemented by tech teams. It's not about mimicking employees performing isolated tasks. It's about designing a new workflow, integrated with the company's technological stack and systems. There are just 100.000 RPA skilled users compared to 22M developers globally that can become RPA coders on Day 1 with BotCity.

We believe that all automation efforts in a single platform is more efficient. We started delivering the best RPA experience for tech teams, but we envision creating the perfect place to also manage crawlers, integrations, scrappers, data operations. Every company automation in a single place.

As companies are becoming tech first and automation will be a basic KPI, we are building to be the all-in-one automation ops management.
one_liner: UiPath for developers. We use computer vision to automate on any tool.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
tags: ["Developer Tools", "Robotic Process Automation", "Computer Vision", "Open Source", "Artifical Intelligence"]
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Payourse
long_description: We build the tools and infrastructure that make it easier, faster and cheaper for anyone in to build user friendly crypto and web3 products.
one_liner: Tools and infrastructure for building user friendly crypto products

name: Cinder
long_description: Cinder is a flexible intelligence and investigation platform that empowers trust and safety teams to make faster and more accurate decisions on the abusive content, fraud, and threats facing their company. By integrating relevant data sources, centralizing decision making, and offering customizable workflows, Cinder powers more effective decisioning for investigative teams across an enterprise.
one_liner: Operating system for trust and safety

name: Nash
long_description:
Nash enables finance teams to manage all their finance flows in one place and craft their money flow experiences globally.  Our ledger-based operating system allows your borderless business to connect all your money accounts, accounting systems, payment service providers, treasury operations, spend management in one place. 

Our mission is to enable borderless commerce in Africa. We achieve this initially by providing your team with all the finance tools needed to build, scale, and grow your borderless business without the need for a costly and complex in-house infrastructure.
one_liner: All in one finance platform for borderless businesses in Africa

name: AntWalk
long_description:
An up-skilling platform that empowers teams with continuous learning tracks to equip them with the right skills at the right time. 

Our up-skilling programs are customised to business objectives of organisations across sales, customer success, general management, technology & product functions & promote employee development by enhancing their existing competencies and developing newer ones. 

AntWalk is powered by 3000+ Experts from 500+ Global Brands across 40+ Countries to power these courses and 1:1 Interactions.
one_liner: An employee up-skilling platform for fast growing companies

name: Legistify
long_description:
Legistify makes it easy for large Indian companies to manage and resolve small legal disputes.
These companies have billions of dollars stuck in millions of such disputes that could easily be tracked and settled through our software.
one_liner: Helps large Indian companies manage and resolve small legal disputes.

name: Moni
long_description:
Moni finances small businesses in groups across Africa. The collective responsibility of the group serves as a collateral on the loan while the social pressure from the members ensures on-time repayment. There are over 44million SMBs in Africa. 
 
We launched 7 months ago and we already have $72k MRR growing at 50% MoM. We achieved 99% repayment on 11,000 units of loans with over $5M disbursed. This is 15 times higher than most financial services in Africa.
 
Femi (CEO) worked previously with the World Bank with a focus on financial services while Dapo (CTO) led the development of the technology for one of the largest digital lending apps

We are also backed by Y Combinator(W22), Magic Fund, Ventures Platform, Voltron Capital and more.
one_liner: Group Financing for small businesses across Africa.

name: Cash Flow Portal
long_description:
Cash Flow Portal is a marketplace for investing in large real estate deals. 

We launched 5 months ago, and we have 6-figure ARR, growing 50% month over month, with 300 syndicators and 3,000 investors. 

We’ve grown quickly because I am a syndicator myself. Having raised $20MM for my own deals, I know how painful it is to manually prepare Docusigns, send wire instructions and wrangle investors. I also happen to be friends with 2,000 other syndicators just like me needing a solution for managing their investors. 

I’m not just a syndicator. I spent most of my career as an engineering leader at Lyft, Twitter, and Amazon. 

$20K ARR per syndicator gives us a $2B TAM. Having achieved my own financial freedom through real estate investing, our mission is to serve all real estate investors and help them achieve financial freedom. 

We launched a consumer facing marketplace: https://www.cashflow.app .
one_liner: Marketplace for investing in commercial real estate
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate
industries: ["Real Estate and Construction", "Housing and Real Estate"]

name: Airwork
all_locations: Remote; Toronto, ON, Canada; Vancouver, BC, Canada
long_description: Airwork is a platform that allows workers in Canada to pick up shifts at any local warehouse whenever they want and get paid the same day. Workers can download a mobile app, sign up for free, book a shift, and get paid all without having to upload any resumes or do any interviews.
one_liner: On Demand Work for Canada
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Recruiting and Talent

name: Simplifyd Systems
long_description:
Simplifyd enables businesses deliver their internet apps (websites/mobile apps) data-free, similar to toll-free telephone lines. We do this through our Zerodata app

Founded in August of 2021 and based in Lagos, Nigeria and Nairobi, Kenya, Simplifyd through its Zerodata platform is a trusted marketplace for data-free internet apps. 

Businesses list their internet apps (websites/mobile apps) on the Zerodata platform so end users can access them data-free!

End users simply need to download the Zerodata app, available for both mobile and desktop, toggle on and enjoy access to listed apps data-free!

We are on a mission to make apps accessible to over ~2B people in emerging economies who simply cannot afford the costs of internet data subscriptions.
one_liner: We deliver toll-free internet apps

name: Durioo
long_description:
We create and license high quality Islamic cartoons and shows that kids watch on our subscription app.

We are the right team to do this because we previously created an Islamic cartoon with more than 3 billion views on YouTube.

All parents want their kids to grow up with values and virtues close to them. The same goes for Muslim parents - but the reality is - they are struggling to get high quality Islamic content for their kids.

We are addressing an underserved market of 70 million Muslim families with internet access globally.
one_liner: Streaming Platform for Muslim Children

name: goodfin
long_description: We are reinventing private banking today for the high net worth individuals of tomorrow. Our customers are founders, investors and professionals all over the world.
one_liner: A private bank for the next generation of wealth

name: Trackingplan
long_description:
Trackingplan automatically discovers and monitors all the information your applications and websites are collecting, ensuring that you can trust your BI, analytics, marketing, and sales tools. 

You can think of us as Segment Protocols but totally transparent, where developers can keep using Google Analytics, Amplitude, Hubspot, Intercom, Braze, etc. as they are used to. 

Installed in minutes in using your Tag Manager or adding just one line of code to your web or apps, we model all the data being sent to third parties. Since Trackingplan understands what each piece of data means, it identifies patterns, detects anomalies, and automatically connects the dots to create value from data that was hidden in plain sight:

- An always up-to-date single source of truth and data governance tool. To discover, understand and document your data and improve communication across teams.
- Automated notifications when something breaks or changes. To make sure that integrations are always well implemented: Schema errors, traffic anomalies, rogue events... 
- Easy to understand, customizable, cross-service alerts. To detect trends, insights, and problems without using complex, engineer-oriented solutions.
one_liner: No-code data observability and monitoring

name: Hydra
long_description:
Hydra is an open source Snowflake alternative built on Postgres. We help startups create a central, consistent data source to solve complex business problems.

Hydra is lightweight, easy to use, and integrates everywhere. Hydra accelerates performance with columnar storage with vectorized execution.
one_liner: The open-source data warehouse

name: Arintra
long_description:
Arintra helps doctors save time and maximize their reimbursement. We do this by automating their clinical documentation and medical coding.  Our software captures patient details before visit, and converts it to clinical notes and subsequently medical codes. Arintra is used by 200+  doctors daily and processes 30,000 patient visits / month.

Both founders have PhDs in AI, significant ML and NLP experience, 60+ patents and publications, and a combined 20+ years of experience working at B2B companies and startups in Silicon Valley.
one_liner: Smart assistant for doctors to automate documentation and coding

name: SmartHelio
long_description:
SmartHelio provides a software that helps solar utilities automatically predict and prevent downtime disruptions. We help solar utilities to generate extra $200k per plant income on $10k spent using our software, by preventing 700 faults per year.

We have a platform which reads live data (current, voltage, weather parameters) from a solar plant, runs algorithms to decouple various factors for the underperformance and provides recommendations to fix it. This data is 100% available for the large scale solar in the world just using software (e.g. APIs). 

Product launch: https://www.producthunt.com/posts/heliocloud

Our cloud software is being used by 40+ leading solar developers in Europe and Asia. We have analyzed 25+ billion of  data points from over 3 GW of solar assets spread across the globe in the last 2 years.
one_liner: Software to prevent downtime in a solar plant

name: Campfire
long_description:
Campfire helps remote teams have actually fun virtual socials. Netflix, Lattice, Spotify, Twilio and more than 80 other leading remote teams use Campfire to stay connected. 

Reach out to Siamak at siamak@campfire.to if you'd like to help realize our vision for a more fullfilling remote future.
one_liner: Actually fun remote team socials

name: Demo Gorilla
long_description:
Demo Gorilla is a browser extension for live SaaS demos that tells your sales team exactly what to say to sell your product.

Keep everyone on the same page with the best customer stores, competitive talking points and feature explanations. Collect insights across product, engineering, marketing, and sales experts to ensure your sales team always knows exactly what will close this deal.

- Automatically get relevant talking points for the part of the product you're on and who you're talking to
- Track notes and metrics back in to your CRM
- Share slides and images in line while demoing to set the stage
- Clean up your UI to keep attendees focused
one_liner: Browser extension tells sales teams what to say

name: Blitzllama
long_description: Blitzllama makes it easy for product development teams to rapidly collect user feedback at scale. With only a simple SDK integration, teams can ask questions to their users within product journeys and get highly contextual answers in minutes. This empowers product teams to ship products that address users' real problems that increase user retention, engagement and reduce churn.
one_liner: A toolbox to collect and analyse in-app user feedback

name: Yunit Inc
long_description: Yunit is the app for investment groups. We make it easy & safe for people to invest in stocks and crypto together.
one_liner: Yunit is the app for investment groups

name: Sendme, Inc
long_description: Sendme is an on-demand provider of clean meat to individuals and food businesses. We built a chatbot that lets customers place orders for meat on WhatsApp and they get it within 3hours.
one_liner: On demand provider of meat to households and food businesses

name: Vendy
long_description: Vendy helps businesses accept offline payments in Africa. Instead of paying with cash, customers can pay a vendy merchant on their phones without internet access.
one_liner: Enabling offline payments in Africa

name: Argo
long_description:
Argo is on a mission to empower Film and TV makers worldwide.  
It’s the easiest way to upload and monetize your content. 
Argo provides the technology and the ecosystem for the Filmmakers to monetize their film and tv work through advertising, subscription and NFT sales.  
Argo is the first Film NFT platform, revolutionizing Film and TV distribution and enabling the creators to build a deeper relationship with their audiences.
one_liner: a platform for monetizing premium short film entertainment

name: Lovage Labs
long_description: Lovage Labs creates automated, virtual receptionists for businesses that can handle almost any customer need over the phone, via text, or on social media. Instead of hiring someone or having to deal with interruptions while working, Lovage helps your customers by answering questions, booking appointments, and more - just like you would.
one_liner: Smart, virtual receptionists for local businesses.

name: Aklimate
long_description: With Aklimate, enterprises provide their suppliers with carbon management tools for free, in exchange for their emissions data. You can imagine it as the company paying for a Watershed-lite for each of their suppliers.
one_liner: Software for enterprises to track and reduce supply chain emissions
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Supply Chain and Logistics"]

name: Fuell
all_locations: Madrid, Community of Madrid, Spain; Remote
long_description: Fuell is an expense management software that helps European companies manage card payments and reimbursements. We automatize expense management so that the employees, bookkeepers, and CFOs can save money and time. We're live in Spain and Portugal. We are working toward a future we call “pay and leave.” Where the employee just has to pay and the receipt is directly sent from the merchant to Fuell, without the employee having to do anything.
one_liner: All-in-one expense management automation solution
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Tendo
all_locations: Accra, Greater Accra Region, Ghana; Remote
long_description:
Tendo enables anyone in Africa to sell online with zero upfront inventory - our mobile app connects dropshippers to local wholesalers. The sellers on the platform are able to source products through Tendo and resell items using social commerce tools, such as WhatsApp, arrange delivery, and get paid, all through the Tendo mobile app.

At the moment, people who want to sell online need to save money, visit hundreds of suppliers to find a trusted one, and risk losing their capital by stocking up inventory. Beyond this, they need to incur costs for logistics and warehousing. We eliminate all that.
one_liner: Meesho for Africa - Enabling Africans to sell online with zero capital

name: Convoy
long_description:
We are building Convoy, an open-source cloud-native webhook service, with out-of-the-box security, reliability, and scalability for your webhooks infrastructure. - https://getconvoy.io

Publishing webhooks today is highly fragmented. There exist no sane open-source tool to enable engineers to build and ship highly scalable webhooks infrastructure. This is exactly what we set out to solve. 

Essentially, just like Redis is to key-value storage, and Gitlab is to DevOps, Convoy is to webhooks.
one_liner: Building an open-source webhooks infrastructure.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Lenco
long_description: Lenco is a multi-currency digital bank for businesses in Africa. With Lenco, retail outlets, hospitality businesses and startups can easily pay vendors, suppliers and perform cross-border payment while having access to growth capital.
one_liner: Pan-African digital bank for Africa's 50m businesses

name: Dojah
long_description: Dojah is an all-in-one identity and verification platform for technology companies in Africa. We have built the most robust API that collates financial, government and facial identity to capture a wholistic, end to end verification of an individual.
one_liner: All-in-one KYC/Identity Verification Platform for Africa

name: SubscriptionFlow
long_description:
SubscriptionFlow is an AI-based customizable revenue management platform that helps SMBs optimize subscription revenue. It monitors user activity to identify customers at risk of churning and automatically alerts the sales team.

For example, eLearning/SaaS/Membership businesses require to monitor subscription usage to improve customer retention. Ecommerce/Magazine companies need to see the subscription trends to cross-sell and upsell products/services.
one_liner: AI based Customizable Subscription & Revenue Management Platform

name: Strong Compute
long_description: Strong Compute is building the future of Cloud Computing, priced by performance not consumption. Our software and hardware optimizations speed up neural network development 10x-1000x, file transfer 1000x, instance start time 10x.  We're starting with AI and are aimed at the $500B cloud market.
one_liner: 10x-1000x faster compute for Neural Network training

name: Grey
long_description: Grey provides USD, EUR, GBP accounts for remote workers in developing countries starting from Africa. For the first time, western companies feel comfortable recruiting skilled workers from anywhere and Grey is making it easy for these workers to receive their salary, save in foreign currency, convert to local currency and spend.
one_liner: Foreign bank accounts for remote workers

name: Finnt
long_description:
Finnt is a banking app for families.
We provide multi-user accounts, which make it easy to save, send and spend globally.
one_liner: Save, Send and Spend as a Family

name: Elphinstone, Inc.
long_description: We're building the equivalent of 401ks for Pakistan as the first step towards building a comprehensive wealth management platform for the country.
one_liner: Robo-advisory platform for Pakistan

name: Bonsai Desk
long_description: Bonsai Desk provides an SDK that developers integrate into their games, and our analytics engine surfaces 3D recordings of users struggling with their game's mechanics. With gaming reaching the mainstream and increasingly monetized as a service, developers need new analytics built for 3D.
one_liner: FullStory for 3D experiences
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Alga Biosciences
long_description: Alga Biosciences is a fast-moving startup focused on transforming the agricultural industry. Our mission is to make an immediate, dramatic impact on global methane emissions produced by enteric fermentation in partnership with the cattle industry. We believe in leveraging biology to tackle the world’s biggest problems.
one_liner: We stop cows from burping methane.

name: Tradezi
long_description:
Tradezi is the Robinhood for Southeast Asia. We aim to help everyone invest in stocks, crypto, and other alternative assets all in one place. 

With a strong founding team with many years of experiences building and scaling billion-user products at Facebook and Google, we provide our users the most seamless and reliable investing experience to meet the current unprecedented growth in Southeast Asia - which is something most incumbent players are struggling with.
one_liner: Robinhood for Southeast Asia

name: Agency
long_description:
Agency performs enterprise-level cybersecurity for individuals at the highest risk of cyberattacks because of their job, employer, or industry. Our subscription includes advanced software, 24/7 monitoring and response, and reimbursement with our Agency Cyber Guarantee. 

We help organizations get advanced security for their largest threat surface while maintaining the privacy of their teams. Agency turns cybersecurity from a burden into a perk.
one_liner: Advanced Personal Cybersecurity for Enterprises

name: Pluto.markets
long_description:
As investing is being democratised, it is also becoming increasingly social. This especially holds true for the new generation of investors (18-35 years of age), who often turn to their friends for trustworthy sparring. 50% of young investors say that they discuss "all or most" of their investments with their closest friends.

Today, this is done in closed WhatsApp groups with users dumping screenshots or sending third-party links. A truly shared investing experience? Difficult. Co-investing? Not possible. Not only has consumer behaviour changed, so has the financial building blocks.

At Pluto we are building the leading investing app for friend-groups enabling them to collaborate, compete and co-invest powered by fractional shares and zero-commission trading. We firmly believe that social is the next disruptive wave which can unlock investing for even more people around the world and improve financial literacy.

Join our mission!
one_liner: Social Robinhood where friends can collaborate, compete and co-invest

name: PayCrunch
long_description: More than 150 million people in India are not able to access formal Credits in India either because of lack of financial data or low credit scores. We use Alternative Credit scoring models to provide a Pay Later option on UPI to a wider audience.
one_liner: Credit Card for college students based on UPI.

name: Livedocs
long_description: Livedocs is a no-code analytics tool for modern teams. We are building a document editor that helps non-technical operators build reports with live data from tools like Stripe, Google Analytics, Segment without writing code.
one_liner: No-code analytics tool for modern teams

name: voize
long_description: voize is the digital voice assistant for non-desk workers. Professionals like physicians, nurses, test engineers, and scientists spend over 2.5 hours on documentation every day. voize helps them finish it in minutes. The user speaks freely into a smartphone and the voize AI automatically generates structured documentation records. We transfer these documentation records into the existing enterprise software systems of the organization.
one_liner: App for healthcare workers to fill out forms using speech

name: Requestly
long_description:
Requestly records all API traffic and allows developers to modify response for any API request without changing anything on the backend. For example - As an Uber engineer, I'd like to test what happens when driver allotment API fails, is there an automatic retry or do we ask the user to retry, or does the app crash. Available as a browser extension on all major browsers & as a desktop app on all platforms.

We are already in production with 40000+ developers across 500+ organizations using Requestly.
one_liner: Test & Debug Web and Mobile Applications for different API errors
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Kaagaz
long_description:
Kaagaz is an 'Office' Suite for Mobile-first Businesses in India. With Kaagaz, these users can manage all the document requirements for their business using their smartphone itself, without needing a Desktop.

We have scaled to 3M MAUs in the last 1.5 years & continue to grow at 10% every month. Having started monetization 8 weeks ago, we already have 2000 paying users, growing our revenue 50% every month.

With over 200M such businesses in India, at $15/year subscription price, this a $3B opportunity in India & much larger globally.

We are a team of 2nd time entrepreneurs having scaled the pervious startup to $1M in GMV. We are backed by YCombinator, Goodwater Capital, Pravega Venture, Better Capital & other investors including Alan Rutledge (TrendMD) and Farid Ahsan (Sharechat)
one_liner: 'Office' Suite for Mobile-first Businesses in India

name: Boya
long_description:
Boya Makes it easy for businesses in Africa to issue corporate expense cards instantly and great software to control and track spending. For example, if you run a pharmaceutical company, you can use Boya to instantly issue Visa cards to sales and marketing teams and get real-time visibility and control over their spending.

50M+ businesses in Africa have no easy way to streamline and track their employee spending in real-time. So we are building a corporate card and a spend management platform that enables businesses to streamline spend workflows and provide real-time reporting. We are building the first corporate card that supports mobile money, banks and card schemes payment workflows
one_liner: Corporate Expense cards and Spend management for businesses in Africa

name: Curacel
long_description:
One API to sell & process insurance across Africa.
At Curacel, our goal is to make it easy and pleasant to get & use insurance in emerging markets.
We are building the rails to make insurance work for the next billion Africans.
one_liner: Plaid for Insurance in Africa

name: FinFlx
long_description:
FinFlx makes it easier and more affordable for SME to offer defined contribution pension plans in line with local labour laws.
Employers can launch a pension plan within hours instead of weeks, with fully digital employee record management, plan administration, investment selection and detailed reporting.
FinFlx is the future of workplace retirement solutions in the Middle East.
one_liner: Flexible pension plans for SMEs in MENA.
regions: ["United Arab Emirates", "Middle East and North Africa", "Remote", "Partly Remote"]

name: LunaJoy
long_description:
LunaJoy is a precision mental health platform that is specialized in women's mental health through all phases of life including adolescence, pregnancy, postpartum, infertility, miscarriage, loss, perimenopause, and aging. We deliver care by creating a specialized workforce to provide targeted psychotherapy, medication management + genetic testing, coaching, and holistic wellness. LunaJoy utilizes technology and data science to provide intelligent touchpoints that decrease costs and accelerate outcomes. We are increasing our in-network footprint to provide truly accessible care for all. 

Women are twice as likely to experience mental health difficulties. Rates are even higher for women of color and LGBTQ+ folks. Women are 3x more likely to experience sexual, physical, emotional trauma which is a predictor for mental illness. This is just the tip of the iceberg! Physiologically, women experience hormonal fluctuations which make them more vulnerable to mental health issues during times of transition such as puberty, pregnancy, postpartum, and menopause. We also face unique stressors as the emotional bedrock of our homes, supporting young families, elderly adults, and a huge part of the workforce. The downstream effects of this gap in care are far-reaching into our ecosystems. Currently, mental health care is expensive, inconvenient, and generalist where a specialized approach is needed. When we attend to women’s mental health, we all shine brighter!
one_liner: Precision mental health care for women

name: Cotera
all_locations: Remote; New York, NY, USA; London, England, United Kingdom
long_description: Cotera is a prescriptive analytics platform that helps you discover how customer behavior predicts growth and retention. Unlike traditional analytics tools, it automatically surfaces the most interesting insights and lets you take action on them, saving hours of analysis and uncertainty.
one_liner: Find your best customers.
regions: ["United States of America", "United Kingdom", "America / Canada", "Europe", "Remote", "Fully Remote"]

name: Takt
long_description:
Takt is a no-code workflow analytics tool. If a process starts in Hubspot and ends in Asana, Takt will show the performance of this process end-to-end.

The explosion of no-code tools has led to millions of untracked workflows. We integrate with your tools and give you end-to-end visibility of mission critical processes.
one_liner: No-code workflow analytics

name: Botin
all_locations: Remote; San José, San José Province, Costa Rica
long_description:
Botin a mobile app where people in Latin America can invest in US Stocks, Crypto and more. 

We are building a one stop shop product for consumers to create wealth in Latin America by giving them the investment tools of the 1%.
one_liner: Investment super app for Latin America

name: Posh
long_description: Posh automates EV battery recycling. There are 30 million battery packs retiring from EV between now and 2030. Most of these batteries have 80% capacity unused and thousands of dollars worth of precious metals. Today a lot of these retired batteries are sitting in warehouses because they are processed manually. We are changing this by making battery disassembly fast, safe and scalable, with 10x efficiency. Our automation system takes the uncertainties out of the equation. We bring affordable lithium-ion batteries to the mass and help create a circular economy for our electric future.
one_liner: Automating EV battery recycling

name: Toko
long_description:
Toko helps English learners in East Asia achieve speaking fluency. Through our mobile app, learners engage in short, realistic conversations with an AI and receive feedback on their grammar.

With over 150 topics, learners can practice real-world scenarios ranging from small talk to workplace discussions. Toko offers a low-pressure environment to help learners build up their confidence.

We make language fluency accessible to everyone - not just those with the means to meet 1:1 with a tutor.

In Taiwan (our first market), Toko is ranked #3 in the App Store for Education!
one_liner: Learn English by speaking with an AI

name: Enlightra
long_description: Enlightra develops mass-manufacturable fingertip-size multicolor lasers enabling ultrafast data communication and optical computing while providing up to 10x improvement in energy efficiency and cost reduction.
one_liner: Multicolor lasers for ultrafast data transmission

name: Cogram
long_description: Cogram lets anybody query data without writing SQL. Users ask questions in plain English—Cogram translates them into database queries, runs them, and visualizes the results.
one_liner: Query data without writing SQL

name: Markaz Technologies
all_locations: Islamabad, Islamabad Capital Territory, Pakistan; Remote
long_description:
We enable WhatsApp, Facebook, and Instagram-based micro-entrepreneurs to source wholesale products from across Pakistan. Our marketplace enables these micro-entrepreneurs to start their business without any investment while we facilitate them by offering their customers a great experience. We do this by taking care of their delivery operations, payments, and customer services. 

Pakistan is one of the youngest populations globally and is expected to become the 7th largest consumer market by 2030. Our vision is empowering 5 M + people, especially women, to start their businesses while working from home and supercharging the eCommerce rails of Pakistan.
one_liner: Reselling marketplace for social media entrepreneurs in Pakistan

name: Eazipay Inc.
long_description: We are Gusto for Africa. Eazipay is a simple, 5-minute payroll payment solution for Africa. We have grown from 10 businesses in January to over 200 with over $5k MRR. Eazipay processes 8 payroll payment types (Taxes, Pension, Insurances, etc) with just one-click and with our own payment infrastructure. Eazipay Payroll APIs are also available for neobanks and commercial banks - to reach at least 50k businesses.
one_liner: Simple Payroll Solution for Africa

name: Wibond
long_description:
Under "Buy Now, Pay Later" business model, Wibond is a 100% flexible digital payment method enabling the 200 million underbanked consumers without credit cards to shop online for the first time. 

We integrate directly into the purchase flow of online merchants, and we offer consumers a credit, when they have already made up their mind that they want to acquire a specific product.
We provide financial and digital access to a large community of people offering payment options according to their possibilities and profile. Wibond is an inclusive and simple solution:
 - Consumers can create their free account to quickly access and pay without banks, in installments, and without a card.
 - Merchants with e-commerce channels increase their sales and integrate Wibond in a very agile way by offering a new form of payment and expanding their markets.

We’re also integrated in the purchase flow of more than 500 merchants, including Samsung, Musimundo (one of the Biggest retailers in LATAM) , and Motorola. And up to 65% of the payment transactions on these sites go through us.
one_liner: Affirm for LATAM

name: Snippyly
long_description:
With Snippyly APIs, developers can make their apps multiplayer & collaborative, just like Figma.

Today, 99% of all online tools we use are siloed & not collaborative. They are not built collaboration-first. With Snippyly, we will fix this. We are defining and setting standards for the future of every shared experience on the web like working together, booking trips together, watching content, shopping, playing, learning together etc.

We imagine a future where you can collaborate with anyone from anywhere like they were there. Snippyly will make the world more collaborative & enable everyone to build more great things together.

We’re a team of ex-Googlers. We've launched products like Augmented Reality in Google Search & Maps, Google Local Services.

Come join us in this exciting journey ahead 🚀
one_liner: APIs to make your app multiplayer, just like Figma.

name: digiventures
long_description: Digiventures SaaS enables banks in Latin America to digitize their loan origination and account opening process. We are live with 30 clients (including 7 banks) in 9 countries.
one_liner: Enabling banks have a fintech-style loan origination process

name: PayCaddy
long_description: PayCaddy enables Latam companies to launch financial products with an API based platform. Rather than building fintech from scratch, or dealing with a legacy bank, companies can use PayCaddy to open digital wallets with KYC checks, automate online payments, and issue personalized debit and prepaid cards for customers or employees.
one_liner: Simplified Banking as a Service for Latam

name: Tuva Health
all_locations: Remote; Salt Lake City, UT, USA
long_description: At Tuva Health, we make open source software that cleans and transforms messy healthcare data.  We’re founded by Aaron Neiderhiser and Coco Zuloaga, former senior execs from Health Catalyst and Strive Health.  We realized data transformation and data quality is the fundamental problem preventing the healthcare industry from building scalable data products.  We launched Tuva and joined the W22 batch of Y Combinator to solve this problem for the entire industry.  Since January 1st, we signed our first customer (paying $10k per month) and completed the first major release of the Tuva Project.  At Tuva, our goal is to (1) become the open standard for healthcare data transformation and (2) build the data network for multi-site benchmarking, research, and machine learning on top of this open standard.
one_liner: Open source software that cleans and transforms messy healthcare data.

name: Plumter
long_description: We're providing payment rails and APIs to help African merchants and consumers easily move money in and out of Africa.
one_liner: Easy foreign payments for Africa

name: Complete
long_description: The complete way to communicate compensation, starting with our interactive offer letters.
one_liner: The complete way to do compensation
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Tingo
long_description:
Tingo is an android dialer app for young people in India. Every day over 40K people use Tingo to set video ringtones for their friends and family. We are growing at 17% weekly and handled 25M+ phone calls through the app in the last 2 months.

The company is built by technical co-founders Chalam (prev Lead ML Engineer @ Snapdeal, IIT Grad) and Sandilya (prev Software Engineer @ Microsoft, IIIT Grad) who know each other for over 12 years after meeting at high school. 

Our vision is to be the phone dialer app for 2.5Bn smartphone users worldwide.
one_liner: Android phone dialer app for young people

name: Anfin
all_locations: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
long_description: Anfin is building a modern trading experience for the retail investors of Vietnam. Anfin is built upon key principles of intuitive design through experimentation, expanded access through fractional shares, and financial literacy through modern forms of education.
one_liner: Modern stock trading for Vietnam

name: InsureMyTeam
long_description:
India’s insurance market is filled with bygone products, which do not cater to 95% of the market's demand for specific products such as illness-specific insurance, primary care with insurance, and surgical insurance to name a few. 

We, at IMT, aim to target this white space by creating innovative products that fulfill this new demand by empowering the agents. Agents are the largest insurance distribution channel in India and cover 85% of the premium collection. 

Agents collect 20B premium every year. With a 5% take rate, it’s a 1B dollar market opportunity growing at 22% CAGR.

Kunal has 15+ years of experience working with insurance companies and building agent networks, while he scaled his brokerage business to 3M dollars in revenue. Rachit has 12+ years of experience in building tech products, he was a founding engineer at Payu (stripe of India).
one_liner: Disrupting Indian Insurance space by empowering agents

name: SALT
long_description: Salt is a neo banking solution stitched together to ease payments and documentation which comes with business banking by moving it to a digital-first and automated end to end platform.
one_liner: B2B Cross-Border Payment & Compliance Platform

name: NearWave
long_description: NearWave makes a handheld imaging device that helps physicians select the right therapy for their breast cancer patients. This prevents patients from suffering through months of side effects caused by unsuccessful treatments.
one_liner: Helping physicians select the right therapy for breast cancer patients

name: Stairs Financial
long_description: Stairs helps young Americans buy their first home. Our home search identifies homes based on their finances, and connects them to government grants, loans and tax breaks.
one_liner: Find a home you can actually afford

name: PermitFlow
long_description: Intuitive workflow software that helps general contractors and developers identify the optimal permitting process and needed application forms for a particular project, and then easily fill the relevant paperwork to prepare a robust application package.
one_liner: TurboTax for Construction Permitting

name: Power to the Brand
long_description:
Power to the Brand is marketing and distribution as-a-service in Southeast Asia, a region on track to hit US2.3T of retail spend by 2025. A consumer brand sends us their goods – we'll do their marketing, take payments and locally deliver. 

Brands save setup costs and time by relying on our pre-built (human and tech) workflows to launch in-country within weeks instead of months. Brands also get to sell through local marketplaces and retailers in our networks, which increases their local consumer reach. 

We abstract away the complexities of operating a distribution business in a foreign country – and help brands sell locally without a single employee on the ground. 

Power to the Brand is founded by Daniel Chua and Rasmus Chow, who are deeply connected in Southeast Asia, and have previously built a successful multi-brand retail and corporate gifts business. 

To date we have 11 brand clients, and are generating $42K in GMV, with operations in Singapore and Indonesia.
one_liner: Marketing & distribution as-a-service in Southeast Asia

name: Kable
long_description:
Kable makes it easy for developers to add usage-based billing, invoicing, analytics, and authentication to their API products with just three lines of code.

We help API companies bring their products to market faster, more securely, and with flexible billing tools that help businesses scale. We provide everything needed to create a delightful experience for developer communities and to optimize revenue while giving time back to engineering teams to focus on what matters most.
one_liner: Usage-based billing for API companies
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Mintlify
long_description: Mintlify makes documentation just show up
one_liner: Developer-first documentation that converts users

name: earnJARVIS
long_description:
earnJARVIS helps wealth management firms effortlessly construct, or access professionally managed, compliant Bitcoin and Crypto portfolios for their clients.

We are Bitcoin and Crypto Turnkey Asset Management Platform & SMA Network
one_liner: Bitcoin and Crypto Portfolio's for Wealth Managers

name: iomete
long_description: We provide a modern data stack with at the core a serverless lakehouse built on Apache Iceberg and Apache Spark. Also includes serverless spark jobs, an SQL editor and an advanced data catalog. It is fully-managed by our team. We provide cloud, on premise and hybrid solutions.
one_liner: The fully-managed modern data stack.

name: Magna
long_description:
Magna is building a platform to turn DeFi investments into financial primitives. Our first product is Carta for Web3, where companies can manage their cap tables and distribute their token equity to employees, advisors, or investors. We’re also building investor infrastructure for institutions to custody investments with on-chain execution and intelligence. Our ultimate goal is to use locked tokens as composable building blocks to power collateralized lending, liquid secondary markets, and other DeFi applications.

Launching a token? Let's chat. Are you receiving tokens from your investments? We can also be helpful.


What are our companies saying about the problem?

> Having it all bundled together would make life easier. We have a million things to do. If you have an off-the-shelf thing, we’d use it.
> This wouldn’t be a nice to have, it’d be a have to have.
> Terrible process. We’re manually sending out transactions, going to solscan and manually check that they received our token. Takes hours every week.
> Everything we do is potentially very dangerous. We have to check it thoroughly. I’ve spent several hours a day on this since launch. I imagine every month, it’ll take us at least 1-2 days.
> Manual process every month for the ops team. They likely burn a week.... every month to pay out 150+ addresses.
one_liner: Carta for Web3: token vesting and DeFi investment management.

name: RecordBook
long_description: RecordBook is one stop solution to manage all business DATA, WORKFLOWS & TEAMS for Small and Medium Businesses on their mobile devices & in their local languages.
one_liner: Airtable for 400 Million SMBs Globally

name: Sphere
long_description:
Sphere is where vetted leading experts run live, cohort-based courses for professionals around the world. We've upskilled learners from over 700 businesses and have annual contracts with companies like Stripe, Flipkart, Tinder and Accenture. Attendees network with each other, engage one-on-one with our instructors, and access exclusive content. 

Each three-week course focuses on a functional skill attendees can apply at work. Prices vary, and employer learning and development budgets often cover the cost. Instructors approved by Sphere take 80% of course earnings, sometimes more than doubling their annual salary. Sphere provides distribution, content and community support to instructors through their platform.

Our goal is to become the largest decentralized corporate university.
one_liner: Expert-led, live courses for employees

name: Speechly
long_description:
Speechly makes it cost efficient to understand human conversations, in real-time. We do this by enabling high-accuracy spoken language understanding processed right on the end user’s device.

Hundreds of millions of hours of audio data are generated every single day online. Speechly is the first solution that can affordably turn this audio into actionable insights.
one_liner: Natural Language Understanding API for Speech that runs on device

name: Stackshine
long_description: Stackshine is creating mission control for enterprise IT teams. We discover all the software being used across their organization and then automate workflows related to onboarding/offboarding, cost savings, and security.
one_liner: Automating all IT operations

name: BharatX
long_description:
We enable brands to launch Credit-as-a-Feature in under 5 mins. They can simply use our Plugins or Copy-Paste style APIs and go live in under 5 minutes without worrying about how Credit Risk or Capital/Compliances etc will work. Simply connect with the BharatX platform and start disbursing Credit. 

Be it to enable a White-Labelled Pay Later option on Checkout or to give your Neobank's users a White-Labelled Instant Credit-Line option.  You can enable it all, as fast as 5 mins!

So next time you buy a course on Frontrow use "Frontrow Pay in 3" and while shopping offline, @Spenny's (YC) "Credit" feature to pay to Merchants Offline on UPI.
one_liner: Enable Buy-Now-Pay-Later in a White-Labelled Manner

name: Ping.gg
long_description: Ping Labs makes software for video creators on Youtube, Twitch and TikTok. We enable podcasters, live streamers, and more to bring guests into their video as easily as joining a Zoom call.
one_liner: Studio quality video without the studio

name: Gauss
long_description:
Gauss allows people with good credit scores to significantly lower interest rates on their credit cards while they keep using them. 

Users connect their credit cards to the mobile app and get a revolving credit line in under 10 minutes. Gauss tracks and automatically pays off any expensive balance on connected cards, saving users thousands of dollars on interest charges and helping them pay off card balances faster and improve credit scores.
one_liner: Lower interest rates on existing credit cards

name: RedBrick AI
long_description:
Teams that are building medical imaging AI use RedBrick AI to rapidly and collaboratively build high quality training datasets. 

The RedBrick AI SaaS platform offers high-performance web annotation tools for 2D and 3D data to give experts access to specialized tooling right from their browser. The RedBrick configurable workflow system helps teams build robust and scalable quality assurance processes. RedBrick AI offers a suite of APIs to help developers consume the annotations being created, and integrate with MLOps.
one_liner: Rapid medical data annotation

name: Flagright
long_description: Flagright is building Stripe for AML Compliance.  It’s a risk-based transaction monitoring API that helps fintech startups quickly set up their compliance infrastructure. We are on a mission to make compliance a commodity and enable startups prevent financial crime globally. We provide customer risk profiling, real-time transaction monitoring, sanctions screening, and other partner-enabled services like KYC and crypto screening on a no-code back office portal.
one_liner: Stripe for financial crime prevention

name: Axis
long_description: Axis is a knowledge base of government regulations and officials that helps large companies do business in foreign markets. For example, if you want to operate in Saudi Arabia - our software tells you which laws you need to comply with and which officials you need approvals from. We cover Saudi Arabia, UAE, Qatar, Egypt, Pakistan, Turkey, and Italy so far and are expanding to key markets in Europe, the Middle East, and Africa.
one_liner: Bloomberg Terminal for Government Affairs Teams

name: HOKALI
long_description: HOKALI is the marketplace for buying sports lessons from more than 260,000 sports coaches in the US. We are the easiest way for them to sell their lessons online, and we take a 30% commission on every transaction.
one_liner: Sports Lessons Marketplace

name: EXO Freight
long_description: Exo freight is a trucking marketplace for open deck shipping. Open deck shipping is how you transport large and odd-shaped loads and represents 20% of the 700 Billion dollar US transportation market
one_liner: Trucking marketplace connecting open deck carriers and shippers
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Supply Chain and Logistics"]

name: Nook
all_locations: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
long_description: Nook is a construction-tech startup based in Ho Chi Minh City that matches reliable, quality workers with construction projects on demand in Southeast Asia. Founded by two Harvard MBA students and a Vietnamese local with 10+ years of construction experience, Nook is solving the most pressing challenges faced by the construction industry in Vietnam.
one_liner: We match reliable, quality workers w/ construction projects on demand.

name: Radius
long_description: Radius offers 15 mins grocery delivery for Indonesia’s tier 2 cities. Our network of hyper-local dark stores allows customers to get groceries delivered faster and cheaper than other online providers.
one_liner: 15 minutes grocery delivery for Indonesia's tier 2 cities

name: Streak
long_description:
At Streak, we are building a new age personalized & gamified banking solution for teenagers.

We are a fast-paced edu-fintech startup working towards redefining children and teenagers' relationship with money.
one_liner: A neo-banking platform for children in India

name: Cardda
all_locations: Santiago, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile; Mexico City, CDMX, Mexico; Remote
long_description:
All-in-one spend management for businesses in Latam.
We give customers tools for bill payments, automated local transfers and corporate cards.
one_liner: All-in-one spend management for businesses in Latam

name: Ole
all_locations: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
long_description:
Ole brings fashion with delivery and return on-demand.
Customers use our app to order clothes from nearby stores, try them at home while the driver is waiting, take only what they like and return to the driver what they don't.

We already have $35k monthly GMV, growing 35% MoM.

What’s unique about our business is our average order value which is 7X higher than typical on-demand business. While their average order is $30, ours is $200, which is why we are already positive in unit economics.
one_liner: Fashion shopping with delivery and return on demand

name: AeonCharge
long_description: AeonCharge is a single app for electric vehicle drivers to pay for any chargers in the US. We’re the largest aggregator in the country, with 76% market coverage and access to over 60,000 charging stations.
one_liner: One app to pay for any electric vehicle charger in the US

name: Palitronica Inc
long_description:
Palitronica builds and deploys cutting-edge solutions to defend critical physical infrastructure and its supply chain.

By using side-channel information from endpoints, Palitronica provides a safe attack detection capability retrofittable to critical systems.
one_liner: Detect cyber attacks on critical physical infrastructure

name: Castled Data
long_description:
Castled is a Customer Engagement Platform (CEP) that brings the power of data in the warehouse to the marketer. It's an ActiveCampaign, Braze or MoEngage, but uses your data warehouse as the storage layer.

Castled is one of the first warehouse native apps/connected apps available in the MarTech space.
one_liner: Customer Engagement Platform (CEP) right on top of your data warehouse
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Dart
long_description:
Dart is project management for startups. It's fast, fun, and easy to use. Through smart defaults, intuitive controls, and AI-based automation Dart saves small teams a third of their project management time.

The founders, Zack and Milad, are longtime friends that met at Stanford as undergrads. Milad built an investment team at PnP Ventures and Zack was the first engineer at Plenty where he grew the engineering and data team to over 50.

We're always interested to talk to anyone, but particularly prospective customers or employees--we're hiring across some really exciting early roles!
one_liner: Project management for startups

name: Soon
all_locations: Remote; Salt Lake City, UT, USA
long_description:
With Soon you can invest without the stress of speculating. Our fully automated sweep account attaches to your bank and uses routine spending activity to signal market trades.
By investing on a schedule and selling available gains when you spend, Soon automates investing from beginning to end. No investing experience required, no need to time the market, just connect Soon to your spending account and build wealth.
one_liner: Automated sweep account, invest without the stress of speculating

name: Armilla AI
long_description:
Armilla AI is a Quality Assurance platform for models allowing enterprises to govern, validate, test, and monitor any and all models across the enterprise in a reliable, consistent, and repeatable manner. 

We make Responsible and Trustworthy AI a reality.
one_liner: Quality Assurance platform for Machine Learning Systems.

name: SnapTrade
long_description: SnapTrade is an API to connect retail brokerage accounts to any fintech app. We enable API access to real-time account data, historical transactions, and trading. This makes it possible to build new investing experiences with existing brokerage accounts, so users don't need to transfer and it's easier to get started.
one_liner: Plaid for trading

name: Bunkyr
long_description:
Bunkyr enables companies to protect their users’ data with a simple, hardware-secured API. When a user forgets their password, applications using Bunkyr can provide them a familiar, robust recovery method to restore access to encrypted data.

Zero-Knowledge architectures and end-to-end encryption are the only true safeguards against data breaches, but come with large user-experience burdens and engineering overhead. Bunkyr eliminates these obstacles in a way that is friendly to both developers and users, cost-effective, and extremely fast.

Users won’t even know Bunkyr exists, while their data stays protected against both breaches and lost passwords.
one_liner: Zero-Knowledge security without seed phrases or backup codes

name: Sophys Health
long_description:
Sophys Health is a no-code analytics platform that enables digital health companies to easily analyze their electronic health record data to predict patient outcomes. Our customers can analyze, visualize and build predictive models within a few minutes, without having to use any code.
Built on FHIR® & SMART on FHIR®  technology.
one_liner: No code analytics platform for EHR data

name: Trucking Up

Whether sellers are in financial difficulty, their house needs some love, or they just want to avoid the hassle of listing the traditional way, by connecting them directly with vetted buyers who will compete to buy their house, accelerating the transition to fully automated real estate transactions.

name: Stock Unlock
long_description:
Stock Unlock is an investment education and analysis platform, built by retail investors, for retail investors. We make it easy for noobies to start their investment journey, and save time for the pros.

We are building THE place for investors to learn, grow, and invest confidently.
one_liner: Web-app | investment education and analysis tools for retail investors

name: Creizer
long_description:
Creizer is Clearbanc (Clear.co) for LATAM. We provide revenue-based financing to online sellers.

More than 80% of SMEs can’t have access to loans in LATAM, thus limiting their growth. They represent 99% of online sellers in the region.
 
At Creizer we built a unique risk model in which the requirements for these online sellers are 100% accessible since the scoring is based on the store’s metrics and collections on a percentage of their daily sales.
 
We are growing 65% MoM and experiencing overdemand every month. Helping our customers to grow up to 7x in less than a year.
one_liner: Clear.co for LATAM. Revenue based financing for online sellers.

name: MosaicVoice
long_description: MosaicVoice makes it easy for call centers to automate their Quality Assurance function. Our software listens to customer conversations in real-time and identifies and alerts agents and managers to any compliance violations as they happen
one_liner: We make it simple for call centers to automate quality assurance.

name: Lightmeter
long_description: Lightmeter is a managed delivery service for sales emails that boosts reply rates while removing any need for maintenance and troubleshooting. It works with existing sales tools like Apollo, HubSpot, and Salesforce. We make sure outbound emails are actually delivered instead of going to spam.
one_liner: SendGrid for Salespeople

name: Phase Biolabs
long_description:
Phase Biolabs is a synthetic biology company building fermentation technology to convert carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions into carbon-negative solvents, a $10B market for the pharma, cosmetic, and paints industries. 

What we are building can also be referred to as carbon capture and utilisation (CCU) or carbon recycling/upcycling, and helps decarbonisation on two fronts. We enable large scale emitters monetise their waste CO2, while also delivering carbon negative chemicals to downstream users. Products made using carbon negative chemicals (95% of products need chemicals) create a positive climate impact by removing CO2 from the environment.

The company is founded by David Ortega, a industrial biotechnologist with a PhD in synthetic biology. To date we have industrial brewers from the EU and the UK signed up for pilots and LOIs for the purchase of $1.5M of carbon negative solvents per year.
one_liner: We make carbon negative chemicals from CO2 using fermentation

name: Firezone
long_description: Firezone is building an open-source alternative to OpenVPN and Cisco AnyConnect. We're much faster than existing options because we're built on a new VPN protocol called WireGuard.
one_liner: Open-source, blazing fast alternative to corporate VPNs

name: Agentnoon
long_description: 🚀 Predictive HR analytics & planning to make better decisions faster ⚡

We are best used for: 1) enabling role-based workflows, 2) creating custom roles per customer, 3) managing customer data within internal tools. We provide an end-to-end solution, from frontend React components to APIs and support tools for maximum engineering efficiency and cross-functional collaboration.

name: shopr.tv
long_description:
We are building live commerce for India. We are Twitch for Fashion and Beauty, where creators can broadcast, build an audience, and monetize by selling over live streams.

Previously we built and scaled one of India’s largest fantasy sports platforms to 8m registered users and $7m in yearly revenue.

We have been live for 4 weeks- growing to over 10k downloads, $2k GMV,  and 26 creators- with an average watch time of 15 mins. We have a strong and growing partner pipeline with over 70 creators and 12 brands whose products these creators can sell.

With an average order value of $55 dollars and 150m consumers, beauty and fashion is a $24B potential market. We make money by taking a 10-12% cut on every sale.

We are experienced founders, targeting a huge opportunity that will revolutionize the way India shops.
one_liner: Creator Led Live Commerce for India.

name: Oto
long_description: Oto is the best way to access digital self directed therapy for people with tinnitus, and at a fraction of the cost of in person treatment. Tinnitus or ringing in the ears affects 1 in 8 people, and before Oto effective therapy was only available via expensive meetings with a specialist.

name: Lexter.ai
long_description: Lexter helps large enterprises like Nestlé to sign contracts 10x faster. Our AI powered legal assistant drafts and reviews contracts, manages the workload, and expedites the signing process.

name: Cerebrium
long_description: Cerebrium is the fastest way to set up data analytics and machine learning without writing any SQL or having a data team. Businesses connect their SaaS tools and within minutes have access to a library of pre-built metrics, dashboards, ML models. Businesses can then create workflows based on the outcomes of metrics, ML outputs and action these back into their existing SaaS tools. We are changing the way businesses operate.

name: Sribuu
long_description: Sribuu is an AI-powered personal financial advisor that has helped >250k Indonesians double their monthly savings in their first month of using the app. We help our users make better money decisions with our wealth management tools and give a personalized saving advice based on their financial habits. We launched in January 2021, and grew by around 50% MoM.
