long_description: Basedash lets product teams ship admin panels without having to build anything. Forget the UI frameworks, technical knowledge, and dev time it takes to build and support internal apps.
one_liner: Connect your database. Get an admin panel.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Porter
one_liner: A modern app platform in your own cloud

name: Ladder
one_liner: Labor Marketplace for Construction

name: 2Cents
long_description: 2Cents is an internet community platform where users are truly recognized for the value of their contributions. At first glance, 2Cents is a social application in which users contribute content to a collection of forum-based communities, experience possibly their first (skill based) token rewards, and craft a personal portfolio of 'in-game' digital avatars used in our content-contribution core loop. However beneath the surface, and in a space where others have fallen short, we are building the machinery to form the basis of the first durable, large scale, user-owned internet community network.
one_liner: User-owned community based social network

name: Nestybox
long_description:
Nestybox creates software that enables Linux containers to act like virtual machines. This increases the use cases for containers and gives enterprises a less expensive and more flexible alternative to virtual machines in many scenarios. 

Our first product is a "container runtime", the software that creates the containers. It's called "Sysbox" and integrates with the popular Docker and Kubernetes engines, enabling these tools to deploy containers that act like virtual machines. 

This technology provides software engineers with an alternative to VMs, one that easier to use, much more efficiency, and easily migrated across clouds.

Hacker News Launch: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=24084758
one_liner: Enables Linux containers to act as super fast & efficient VMs

name: Fancy
long_description: On-demand grocery delivery company based in the UK. We delivers snacks, drinks and more in under 30 minutes.
one_liner: Essentials delivered in 30 minutes.

name: Together Video Chat
long_description: Together transforms the way kids and grown ups participate in a video call by providing educational activities, books and interactive games that can be played while video chatting.
one_liner: Interactive video chat made for kids and families

name: Drapr
long_description: Drapr lets shoppers try on clothing, online. Apparel brands use Drapr to make more money online.
one_liner: Try on clothing online

name: Sameplan
long_description: Sameplan is a customer-facing collaboration tool that enables sales teams to align with prospects, increase efficiency, and close more business. Enterprise deals can be very complex, rather than managing these high-value relationships over email, Sameplan acts as the central hub for the deal.
one_liner: Customer-facing plans for sales teams and their prospects.

name: Clew
long_description: Clew lets employees see and organize files across their work apps from one place.
one_liner: Unified file system for the cloud.

name: KeyDB
long_description: KeyDB is a fast key value database that combines in memory caching and FLASH persistence in a single package.
one_liner: The only database you'll ever need

name: Vectrix
long_description:
As organizations around the world continue to rapidly adopt SaaS applications as the way they run their businesses, many are left without a way to manage the security of those same applications.

Corporate IT and security teams are left asking questions like:
- How will I know if someone shares a sensitive Google Doc publicly?
- What if one of our employees doesn't have two-factor authentication enabled in Zoom?
- Will I know when a new user is added to Slack?
- What happens if our Salesforce minimum password setting isn't strong enough?

With Vectrix's easy-to-use SaaS security scanning, organizations everywhere can quickly identify security issues and risks like these across their entire suite of SaaS apps, including Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, Slack, Zoom, GitHub, and more.

When new issues arise, IT and security teams can be alerted in real-time so that further action can be taken right away.

Founded by former security professionals from Autodesk, Vimeo, and PlanGrid, Vectrix is committed to providing teams of all sizes an efficient and reliable way to stay secure in the public cloud.

Get started at https://www.vectrix.io
one_liner: Scan your SaaS apps and instantly identify security issues

name: Workbase
long_description:
We help B2B companies reduce churn and grow customer spending. 
Our product gives account managers access to data dashboards and priority checklists needed to proactively save customers and upsell them to more profitable products.

Most companies have all the data they need to figure this out, but it’s often locked away in 20 different systems. There is no central place for an account manager to easily prioritize which customers to focus on and what actions to take to help them. Workbase is the solution, by one-click integrating the data sources and customizing the interface and actions for each company.

When working on similar internal tools at companies like Segment, we saw first-hand that proactively managing the customer journey could increase net retained revenue by as much as 20 percent.
one_liner: Data & workflow platform for B2B account teams

name: Omni
long_description: Omni is an intelligent chrome extension to help teams manage their internal knowledge and keep it 100% up to date. It fits in the natural workflow, integrates with current knowledge sources, and provides bite-sized answers when needed.
one_liner: Fast, up-to-date answers for Sales & Support

name: Strive School
long_description: In exchange for a part of their future salary, select students can become professional-grade software engineers through a six-month online program. While the majority of universities in Europe are free to attend, STEM courses are often outdated and theoretical; Strive School works with those pursuing STEM fields to help them become job-ready software engineers.
one_liner: Training the next generation of software engineers in Europe 🇪🇺

name: Gather
long_description: Gather is software that helps high-growth teams build and execute their onboarding, offboarding, and other People Operations programs. Gather replaces manual coordination with smart, automated communication powered by a deep integration with Slack.
one_liner: Project management software for People Operations
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Bandit ML
one_liner: Bandit ML builds machine learning tools for e-commerce companies.

name: LSK Technologies
one_liner: A diagnostic lab in a box

name: Reploy
long_description: Reploy makes it dead simple to generate full-stack staging environments or “previews” of web apps on every pull request. This helps teams move faster by sharing changes instantly, with everyone!
one_liner: Instant, shareable staging environments

name: Parade
long_description: Through a series of simple questions, Parade’s machine learning-based software helps startup founders articulate the vision for their company, translate it into a design aesthetic, and launch it online in under 10 minutes. Parade makes it easy to create a website, marketing emails, social media posts, and more, all without a graphic designer.
one_liner: Launch your company without hiring a designer

name: Memo
long_description:
We all know the attention economy is damaging our ability to focus. Memo is for people that are mad as hell about their time being sold to the highest bidder.

Forget laborious old email and hyperactive Slack.  We built Memo as the feel-good alternative that will make you love communication again and get back time for what matters to you.

Memo's features make every message high value so you can communicate more effectively.
one_liner: Memo is modern communication that helps you get your focus back
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Intelligent
long_description:
We help businesses cut operational costs, while still exceeding customer expectations.
Most businesses are consistently under- or over-staffed, which either damages customer experience or leaves money on the table (by unnecessarily increasing staffing costs). Granular, high-accuracy demand forecasting solves this issue by allowing businesses to align resources to exactly meet demand. 
Our demand forecasting as a service, brings simplicity & precision to this often complex and error-prone process, and quickly provides business users the right answers to run their operations.
one_liner: Demand Forecasting as a Service

name: In Stock
long_description: In Stock makes it easy to shop from local stores and get it delivered that day.
one_liner: Find any product, in stock nearby

name: Foreword
one_liner: A marketplace for live, online workshops for professionals

name: Nototo
long_description: Nototo is a workspace that allows you to organize ALL of your information, on ONE map.
one_liner: A workspace with a spatial interface

name: RTCanary
long_description: WebRTC is the reason we’ve stayed connected and productive during the COVID era, powering most of the browser-based video communications platforms you use every day (Google Meet, Facebook Messenger, etc.). But when a call gets dropped or the audio cuts out, it’s hard for the video developers to understand why it happened. This is a major problem for new players in the video chat industry that lose customers because of call quality issues; customers should be able to use video platforms with the features they want without having to sacrifice call quality.
one_liner: We are a monitoring and analytics plugin for all video chat platforms.

name: Rume
long_description: Video chat today is built for meetings but you wouldn't have your birthday party around a conference table. Rume re-creates the social dynamic of an in person event where you are easily able to have smaller conversations and fluidly move between groups when you see someone you know.
one_liner: Video chat that doesn't feel like work

name: Metamanagement
one_liner: We help SaaS companies deploy into their customer's environment.

name: Overfit
one_liner: Human coach for accountability + AI for personalized workouts

name: Nash
long_description: Nash makes it easy for businesses to offer same-day delivery. We do this by building business workflows on top of delivery APIs (like Doordash, Uber, Skipcart). For example, a local dry-cleaning business can start offering pickup and dropoff service at a customer’s desired time without operating their own fleet.
one_liner: The easiest way for any business to offer delivery
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Supply Chain and Logistics"]

name: Slash
long_description:
Slash makes it dead simple for any person to set up their legal, finance, and back office business stack in minutes. 

Our mission is to eliminate all the friction involved with starting a business, and empower the next generation of entrepreneurs to build their own future in the process. 

Still in beta, thousands of young entrepreneurs that have side hustles reselling, flipping NFTs, and running e-commerce sites use Slash's tools to run their businesses.

Slash is backed by NEA, Stanford University, the founders of Tinder and Plaid, and other amazing angels and funds.
one_liner: The bank for young solo entrepreneurs.

name: MarqVision
long_description: MarqVision helps global brands take down counterfeits from online marketplaces (think: Amazon + Alibaba). MarqVision uses AI-powered anti-counterfeiting software to automate the detection and reporting of counterfeits. Fueled by e-commerce and social media, counterfeiting is the largest criminal enterprise in the world, with annual sales surpassing $2 trillion last year. Founded by Harvard Law Students and backed by Softbank and Y Combinator, MarqVision raised a $5 million seed round and reached $1 million in ARR since launching in November 2020. (HQ: Los Angeles)
one_liner: We help global brands remove counterfeits from online marketplaces.

name: Yummy
long_description:
Yummy started as the first food delivery app in Venezuela, now available in 4 countries in LATAM. After doing over 700,000 monthly orders the business has rapidly expanded into other verticals: groceries, alcohol, pharmacy, shopping, ridesharing and merchant enablement solutions. 

Merchants can use Yummy's payment infrastructure to automate their payments in whatsapp and instagram as well as create their own online store.
one_liner: SuperApp for users and merchants in LATAM

name: Karbon Card
long_description:
We at Karbon Cards provide corporate credit cards to Indian private limited companies without any fixed deposits. Most good companies qualify for credit - 10% of annual profits for profitable companies or 1% of cash balance for VC backed startups. 

For those do not qualify, we have corporate cashback card where they can top up, use their card, and get 0.5% of cashback. In addition of cards, we provide vendor payment solutions that our customer love, as it is 5X better than banks.
one_liner: Corporate Card solution for Indian businesses

name: Careerist
long_description:
Careerist is an ed-fintech platform that trains job seekers for tech careers (in QA, Sales, Support & more), finances them and automates their job hunting. Our B2B2C platform aggregates job seekers, tutors and employers – streamlining training and placement.

Techcrunch: "Edtech meets SaaS in Careerist’s job placement learning platform. The startup trains job seekers through live and self-paced training taught by third-party tutors. The adaptive learning software is meant to help candidates prep for tech interviews. Once a candidate is well equipped, Careerist uses automation to help them apply for jobs."
one_liner: Learning platform for job seekers with job applications automation

name: JABU Logistics
long_description: HQ in Namibia, and expanding in Southern Africa, JABU helps shops and bars place orders digitally to stock up their shop, and JABU fulfills the demand on the same-day through tech-enabled warehousing, last mile distribution and payment collection. On the FMCG side, JABU is empowering brands managers with live dashboards where they interact with the new frontier of retail. Now launching a wallet, merchant services for banks and merchandising services for brands.
one_liner: Last-mile distribution marketplace for informal retailers in Africa
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Supply Chain and Logistics"]

name: Revolve Surgical
long_description:
Revolve is building the world’s only surgical robot designed for every operating room. Its simple yet powerful design makes it the only robot that can service the 1M+ abdominal surgeries performed outside of hospitals in the US every year.

The founders met at the top surgical robotics lab in the country where they worked on next-generation surgical tools for the da Vinci Surgical System. Collectively, they’ve worked on medical robots for applications in general surgery, ENT, urology, dentistry and neurosurgery; medical imaging AI (ex-Swift Medical); rehabilitation devices, surgical instruments for pediatrics; the Ford GT; and a lunar rover.

Revolve’s surgical robotics platform has been developed in collaboration with over 50 surgeons, resulting in a system that is just 1% of the size and cost of competitor devices. The robot has been validated through animal testing, and the company has secured LOIs from Buffalo General Hospital and Pearl Women’s Center.
one_liner: Surgical robotics for every operating room

name: Liv Labs
long_description:
Liv Labs is a US-based consumer healthtech company making solutions for incontinence. 
29 million American women worry about leaking pee in public: a $7B market. Liv Labs is developing a simple medical device to keep them dry at the gym and adaptive exercise software to restore natural continence. Device inventor, Carly Price, reimagined the humble pillow for Casper and now leads the Silicon Valley Design Lab for Ford. Company CEO, Melody Roberts, incubated digital service experiences now scaling globally at McDonald’s and Panera. We’ve raised over $2.5M to date. This total includes a $256K Phase 1 Digital Health grant from the NSF and a $1.67M Direct Phase II SBIR grant from the NIH, based on stellar effectiveness data and user feedback like, “With this, surgery is off the table.” Our FDA-reviewed clinical trial starts soon at Northwestern University.
one_liner: Solutions for incontinence

name: Mecho Autotech
long_description:
It is cumbersome to maintain/repair vehicles in Africa. Vehicle owners currently have 2 options to choose from; very expensive and geographically limited branded mechanic garages (less than 1% of the supply pool) or unvetted roadside mechanics (about 99% of the supply pool). 

About 95% of vehicle owners cannot afford branded garages where quality and reliable service delivery can be guaranteed and thus rely on roadside mechanics. However, low quality and transparency are typical issues associated with roadside mechanics. 

We created a network of vetted mechanics, spare part vendors and an app that enables easy booking, payment and mechanic matching process. Via the mecho app, a customer or business can make a request for any automobile service (repairs or regular servicing) or part.
one_liner: On-demand  auto maintenance & repairs

name: Odiggo
long_description: Odiggo is in stealth.
one_liner: Stealth

name: Beau
long_description: Beau is a no-code tool for businesses to onboard and automate interactions with their clients. Customers use our software to collect submissions, payments, send messages and more.
one_liner: Workflows for repetitive customer-facing tasks

name: Toku
long_description: Toku helps B2C companies increase their monthly revenue collection rate so they can focus on the their main business. Payment method management, failed payment retries, payment reminders, failed payment notifications, among others.
one_liner: Payments for subscription companies in LATAM
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Metaphor
long_description: We're building a new search engine over the internet using techniques inspired by large language models. Self-supervised learning is a paradigm that will produce radically new capabilities in many areas of tech. We're applying it to search, and in doing so, we hope to make sorting through the huge amount of information on the internet as easy as if you were calling up a memory.
one_liner: Searching the internet with large language models

name: Safer Management
long_description:
Safer Management sells attendance software to public school districts and colleges. Public schools receive federal funding based on their average daily attendance, and our software ensures they get the money they need.

We started Safer Mgmt. 12 months ago after I dropped off my twin boys and experienced inefficiencies with the sign-in process. We are now in 75 public schools and two colleges with annual reoccurring revenue of $621,000. We have 82% margins and are profitable. At scale, we will charge $15 per student per year. 

There are 70 million public school students in America which is a $1.4 billion dollar market opportunity.
one_liner: Student Attendance tracking for Public Schools

name: Chipax
all_locations: Remote; Santiago, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile
long_description: Chipax handles all payments, invoices, and reconciliations to provide real-time AR & AP for SMBs, starting in Mexico and Chile. We're currently at $1.6M ARR with more than 1,100 paying businesses. The company is founded by Antonio Correa, François Gueneau de Mussy, Joaquín Brenner, and Felipe Urzúa, Engineers from top universities in Chile, who have all experienced the pain of managing SMBs finances first hand in their previous jobs.
one_liner: Quickbooks for SMBs in Latam
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Amenli
long_description: Amenli is the first licensed online insurance broker in Egypt. Egypt has one of the lowest insurance penetrations in the world with a 100m population and a $2B GWP market growing 20+% YoY and a potential TAM of $10B. Over the past few months, Amenli issued 500+ policies in less than 10 mins compared to the minimum of 3 weeks industry standard. Amenli co-founders, Shady & Adham were founding team members of Paymob, one of the fastest growing payment companies in MENA. Shady was CCO and Adham was its Tech Lead and they worked together for more than 3 years to scale-up Paymob from scratch to 50K+ merchants, 5 countries and dozens of millions of monthly transactions.
one_liner: Offers insurance to customers in a convenient & transparent way

name: Pide Directo
long_description:
PideDirecto is a branded digital ordering and delivery solution for local buisness in Latam. We build out their direct-to-consumer sales channels and enable them to deliver their products in under 30 minutes. 

We empower local buisness such as restaurants, pharmacies, local grocery stores, flower shops, clothing stores, cake shops and many more by building out their own branded website, integrating phone and social media orders and helping them deliver their products in less than 30 minutes. While also providing our partners key customer insights and marketing support. 

All for a reasonable fixed monthly fee, without eating up margins with hefty commissions and service charges.
one_liner: Enabling brands in LatAm to sell direct and deliver in under 30min.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Supply Chain and Logistics
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Supply Chain and Logistics"]

name: Lightly
long_description: When ML teams send their data to companies like Scale.ai for labeling, most can only afford to label 1% or less of their datasets.  But today they don’t have a good way to pick which 1% to label. We help them pick the best 1% of their data to label.  By labeling the most representative data, they significantly improve model accuracy at the same cost.
one_liner: Help ML teams label the right data
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Equipt Health
long_description: Equipt Health makes it easy for any healthcare company to offer prescription medical devices to patients. We handle the whole process: the packaging, the logistics, the clinical (via our provider network) and technical support, and the return of data from connected devices. We're starting with the diagnosis and treatment of sleep apnea at heliosleep.com.
one_liner: Home medical equipment, prescribed online and delivered.

name: Payflow
long_description: A mobile app. It allows employees to get paid whenever they want, instead of just once a month (or biweekly). We sell it to companies as an employee benefit (B2B SaaS).
one_liner: A mobile app. It allows employees to get paid their salary on-demand.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Charge Robotics
long_description:
Charge Robotics is building robots that automate the most labor-intensive parts of solar construction.

Solar has rapidly become the cheapest form of power generation in many regions. Demand has skyrocketed, and now the primary barrier to getting it installed is labor logistics and bandwidth.

Our robots remove the labor bottleneck, allowing construction companies to meet the rising demand for solar, and enabling the world to switch to renewables faster.
one_liner: Robots that build solar farms

name: Ahazou
long_description: Ahazou is a SaaS app that helps offline local businesses to connect online with their customers to promote their brand, to build their reputation and to sell more. We've reached USD100k MRR with 16k+ subscribers. Our vision is to build the next all-in-one platform for 50 million local businesses to grow online in Latam. The company is founded by Rui Miadaira - 10+ years building local businesses, 3x entrepreneur, tech background with a Harvard MBA - and has built a team from iFood, Movile, PicPay. Ahazou is backed by GFC, Monashees, Y Combinator (S21) and more.
one_liner: Podium for local businesses in Latam

name: Titipku
long_description: Local market is a traditional wet market that consist with 200 - 1000 merchants who sell groceries located in every residential area. We  digitize all these merchants into our apps and provide personal shoppers. So every household can buy groceries from multiple merchants at one local market in one single order. There are 16.000 local markets in Indonesia with 8.000.000 merchants inside.
one_liner: Super Hyperlocal Marketplace for SMEs in Indonesia

name: HEO Robotics
long_description: HEO Robotics visually monitors satellites for governments and defence. We do this by transforming existing Earth observation satellites with software to image other satellites as they fly close by.
one_liner: We visually monitor space objects for governments and defense

name: Satsuma
long_description:
Satsuma is a developer tool for building applications on top of real-time blockchain data. Our product lets developers take decoded data from multiple chains, customize it for their use cases, and access it through API endpoints.

Blockchains serve as distributed databases for these products, holding their most important data. However, it’s difficult to access and query that data. We believe this friction is an enormous blocker for web3 developers and want to empower the products that bring about mass adoption for web3.

We’re a founding team of engineers, having built data infrastructure and product as early employees at Airtable, Heap, and Y Combinator.
one_liner: Tools for indexing and querying real-time blockchain data.

name: Turion Space
long_description: Turion Space is building spacecraft to move things around in space and image space objects when they’re not, and focused on developing the dual-use technology required to ensure a sustainable future in space. They aim to build a strong foundation selling space domain awareness imagery data while advancing their technology towards an affordable solution for orbital debris removal and eventually asteroid mining. The founding team originates from SpaceX, and after going through the Y-combinator accelerator in summer 2021 went on to raise a $6.2M seed round and is launching their first DROID satellite in early 2023.
one_liner: Moving Things Around in Space, Imaging Space Objects When We're Not

name: Stepful
long_description: Stepful trains people with a high school education in 4 months and places them into healthcare jobs. Healthcare is the fastest growing industry in the US accounting for 40% of all jobs added including medical assistants, nursing assistants, and phlebotomists.
one_liner: Online Training for Healthcare Jobs

name: Synder
long_description: Synder is an easy accounting platform focused on e-commerce.  It connects all sales platforms (like Shopify, Stripe, Amazon or Etsy) into one ecosystem, providing businesses with consolidated cash flow, automated accounting, and inventory management making Synder a single source of truth of the correct analytics, accounting and tax filing.
one_liner: Easy accounting for e-commerce
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Café
long_description: Café connects teams across your organization through real-life interactions. Build authentic relationships based on interests with events, groups and communities — all in one place.
one_liner: Social Hub for Hybrid Teams
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Datlo
long_description: Datlo is a geointelligence platform made for sales and marketing folks. In seconds you can conduct market research, find new customers, and distribute channels for your company. All of that without needing a data scientist or a programmer.
one_liner: Datlo helps companies increase sales and expand through data

name: OneShop
long_description: OneShop is how resellers go pro. People use OneShop to turn their treasure-hunting hobby into a full-time business through our app that simplifies listing and selling across marketplaces.
one_liner: Operating system for reselling online

name: FirstIgnite
long_description: FirstIgnite connects companies with the global academic research market.
one_liner: Connecting Industry and Academia

name: Aviator
long_description:
Aviator is a developer tool that automates merge workflows and keeps builds healthy. Engineers save up to 5 hours a week and avoid frustration of broken builds.

Our users include Slack, Bosch, Lightspeed, Square, Benchling, Figma and many others. For instance, Slack went from 180 master-build failures per quarter to just 1 build failure when they started using Aviator.

Our goal is to become the leading brand for developer experience.
one_liner: Google-level engineering productivity suite
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: LabSimply
long_description: There are over 70 million low accuracy tests done in US every year for conditions like the flu. Labsimply is using novel CRISPR enzymes to replace these with Point-of-care tests that offer PCR accuracy in 5 minutes or less.
one_liner: CRISPR powered Diagnostics with results in < 5mins

name: Talentdrop
long_description:
Talentdrop is turning recruiting into an open marketplace, where hiring companies post bounties for their open roles and any recruiter or other professional can collect it by referring a successful candidate. Companies get more people working on their hiring problem without having to pay more for it, and now anyone can earn big recruiting bonuses previously limited to a few firms.

Professional recruiters can now monetize the excess candidate inventory created from their primary business. This is work they've already done but previously couldn't benefit from. Likewise, candidates won't have to start the vetting process over from scratch again and again since they'll be able to be referred with context and get warm intros into hot hiring companies that can be hard to access. Companies can also share candidates in a more efficient way (for example, Company A has two great product candidates but only one headcount - they can refer the second).

Machine learning will help us make better hiring recommendations faster.
one_liner: Marketplace that matches talent to a company's needs.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Recruiting and Talent

name: Stack
long_description: Stack helps users to save for their life goals like retirement, marriage, education through low fees and globally diversified ETF portfolios in an effortless and automated manner. Savings can be set on autopilot by setting personalised rules such as 'round up' on transactions or 'set & forget'.  Stack also helps the users to earn passive income as they spend through Stock reward on the Stack Card.
one_liner: New age wealth management app for India

name: GamerPay
long_description:
GamerPay is a marketplace for trading gaming skins and assets without scams. We do this by integrating with games to instantly validate all trades.

We launched 3 months ago and transacted 245.000 dollars growing 30% MoM. 

Talking to 5.000 gamers we learned that 46% have been scammed more than once. Over half are minors, who are stuck trading for cash on social media due to their age. 

We are the first to build a fully compliant system for parental consent, enabling the majority of gamers to trade legally and giving the parents peace of mind.

There are 215 million trades annually in games we support. We make 7 dollars on average per trade. So a $1.5B initial market, growing fast alongside gaming and blockchain game economies.   

The team behind previously co-founded the largest transactional marketplace for secondhand high end clothes in Denmark, with 1 million users and a yearly transacted GMV north of $40 million.
one_liner: We are the marketplace for trading gaming skins & assets without scams

name: Sitenna
all_locations: Remote; Atlanta, GA, USA; Birmingham, England, United Kingdom; Limerick, County Limerick, Ireland
long_description:
Modern infrastructure (incl. 5G wireless and EV charging) has a problem. Whilst analysts are claiming exponential growth in deployments in the coming years, the truth is that the process of site acquisition and management is currently manual, archaic and painful. Sitenna has developed software to digitise the process reducing site acquisition from currently 24 months to a matter of weeks. We work with Real Estate, Local Government, Infrastructure Providers and Operators.

Sitenna launched in the UK in late 2021 and was selected as the leading software vendor to a UK government sponsored infrastructure project, with over 1m assets on the platform and all major telecom players active, including BT, EE and BAI. 

The team is led by a group of industry veterans with C-Suite level access to telecom companies worldwide. Daniel has worked in the telecoms industry for over 12 years and he has supported $100bn in transactions in over 30 countries. Brian has over 12 years’ experience as a technical consultant including BAE Systems Applied Intelligence, Norkom and Ericsson. Both are multiple time founders, execs and non-execs in start-ups including exits.
one_liner: B2B SaaS for modern infrastructure to deploy and manage sites
regions: ["United States of America", "United Kingdom", "Ireland", "America / Canada", "Europe", "Remote", "Fully Remote"]

name: Evidence
long_description:
Evidence is a web framework that's designed for data analysts. It's a modern alternative to drag-and-drop BI tools and Jupyter notebooks. 

Evidence enables data analysts to build automated reports, analysis and tools that feel like they came from the graphics department at a top-tier publication. All with skills that they already have.
one_liner: Business intelligence for modern data teams

name: Protego
long_description: Protego helps companies recover lost revenue from chargebacks. The company automates chargeback management and dispute processes. It provides real-time monitoring, reporting, and analytics on chargeback information for providing valuable insights into fraudulent consumer behavior.
one_liner: We help companies recover lost revenue from chargebacks

name: Luminate Medical
long_description: Luminate Medical is developing a medical device that helps cancer patients prevent chemotherapy induced hair loss in a comfortable and portable way. Over 1.1M US patients receive chemotherapy treatments causing hair loss each year, creating a $1.7B market in the US alone. To date, we've used our novel compression therapy to prevent hair loss in a 120 animal study, and completed a clinical study showing our device works with healthy volunteers. Our team includes a Thiel Fellow, and a Biomedical Electronic Engineering PhD who has led clinical trials for breast cancer patients.
one_liner: We build medical devices to stop the side effects of cancer treatment.

name: Pactima
long_description:
Pactima is a value-centric, fast-growing, and venture-backed company that’s transforming the manner in which businesses conduct transactions in our remote world.

Our flagship product, Live eSignatures<sup>TM</sup>, is a real-time solution that allows people to view and sign documents while simultaneously hosting a secured video call. This easy-to-use solution allows transactions that could only be done in-person to now be performed online.
one_liner: Live video signing for real-time agreements

name: Medium Biosciences
long_description: Our product is a software platform that makes it really easy for industrial biotechnology companies to interface with machine learning models for enzyme engineering. Enzymes power most chemical reactions in nature but usually need engineering to work at industrial scale. Our models can be used to suggest high performing sequences that would have typically taken months of wet lab work to identify.
one_liner: Deep Learning for Enzyme Engineering

name: Adra
long_description:
Adra is a software that helps dental clinics find cavities and other problems in x-rays faster and more accurately so they can book more procedures and increase their revenue. We started our pilot with 20 dentists 2 months ago and have already increased their clinic revenue by 12%. 
Adra is founded by a dentist and clinic owner, a machine learning expert, and a bioscientist.
When every dentist uses Adra, they will bill patients an extra $52B per year. We will capture a quarter of that, making our addressable market $13B.
https://www.adra.ai/
one_liner: Driving dental clinic revenue by finding more cavities

name: BlackOakTV
long_description: BlackOakTV is a subscription video platform hyper-serving black viewers and creators. We make it easy for black viewers to find, watch and engage with the content and creators that most reflect their lives and experiences.
one_liner: A video subscription platform serving black viewers and creators.

name: Tantl
long_description: Tantl allows teams to quickly build business events and alerts on top of your data, without relying on a developer. Connect to your data resource (Postgres, BigQuery), and start receiving targeting notifications in Slack, Discord, or Microsoft Teams.
one_liner: Build event notifications and alerts on top of your data
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Spoken
long_description:
Spoken is a website where users compare buying options for the exact same product across multiple stores. We help our users never overpay online.

Dane is a two-time technical YC founder; he sold his previous company, Parklet, to Greenhouse where he was VP of Platform for 4.5 years. Geoff is a Stanford MBA grad and sold his previous company Cabrio Taxi.
one_liner: Never overpay online

name: StandardCode
long_description:
StandardCode is the maker of AutoCRM. We help sales teams be more efficient when using LinkedIn. We do this by automating and tracking LinkedIn outreach tasks in your CRM of choice.

Book a demo: https://calendly.com/itsdhung/autocrm-demo
one_liner: LinkedIn automation and activity tracking for sales teams

name: SFA Therapeutics
long_description: SFA Therapeutics is creating therapeutically-tailored oral drugs that regulate the immune system from bacterial metabolites; with a focus on autoimmune diseases and cancers that originate from chronic inflammation. There are over 100 million patients who suffer from autoimmune diseases. Our treatment is designed to block the root cause of many of these chronic inflammatory diseases, with a safe oral drug.
one_liner: Regulating the immune system to block cancer & autoimmune diseases

name: Codex
long_description: Codex is a devtool and local first solution that enables just-in-time documentation for deep collaboration wherever you work. From your IDE, like VSCode, to our desktop app. When you’re working and think “what the #$@%!? does this code block do?” Codex let’s you request context with a button click. It then determines the best person to respond and stores their answer for other team members to access later, all automatically and directly on the code block.
one_liner: Give new meaning to your code base.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Saay
long_description: Saay is an app that provides actionable insights for sales teams to close up to 40% more deals. We do this by monitoring apps like Salesforce & Hubspot, and tell them like when, how and who to follow up with using Machine Learning.
one_liner: Actionable Insights for sales teams to close more deals

name: Mindmesh
long_description:
Mindmesh is the virtual desk that puts you in control. 
Centralize work, notes, todos, and meetings. Jump back in an instant. Focus on what you should be doing, right now.
one_liner: Mindmesh is the virtual desk that puts you in control.

name: Opkit
long_description: Opkit (YC S21) is Stripe for healthcare - the easiest and best way for healthcare providers to accept patient payments online. We are building an online checkout page that automatically calculates the patient's deductible, copay and/or coinsurance charge based on their health insurance plan. Opkit was founded in June 2021 by Sherwood Callaway and Justin Ko, a full-stack early engineering team from Brex, the $12b+ fintech startup. We are backed by top VCs and healthcare experts, including Y Combinator and Andreessen Horowitz.
one_liner: Stripe for healthcare

name: Crew
long_description:
Instead of waiting for candidates to apply, companies use Crew to pro-actively contact, nurture & close talent, at scale. 
The 1st all-in-one recruiting CRM that lets teams automate their outbound efforts, streamline the hiring processes, and gather all the data in one place.
one_liner: Modern Recruiting CRM
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Therify
long_description: Therify is an inclusive mental health benefit for companies. Through our web platform, employees access culturally responsive therapists, live community sessions, and self-guided content to support their emotional well-being.
one_liner: Inclusive mental healthcare for companies
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Phykos
one_liner: Growing seaweed to stabilize the climate.

name: Hirebolt
long_description:
We are disrupting hospitality hiring by reducing the time it takes to hire staff from months to < 3 days.

Hiring staff is the biggest challenge for many of the 2M+ hospitality businesses in Europe. Covid and Brexit ceased the usual oversupply of candidates, making traditional job boards unable to meet employers' needs, and agencies more expensive than ever. As a consequence, employers spend huge amounts of time sourcing candidates manually and filtering through irrelevant CVs. Up to 80% of candidates who get invited to an interview, don't even show up.

At Hirebolt we eliminate all this work for employers, by finding actively-looking candidates, vetting them and automatically matching them to the best employers using AI. We schedule interviews and extend offers to candidates faster than humans can, giving employers time back to run their businesses.

To date, we’ve raised ~$1.5M from investors including Y Combinator, Entrepreneur First, world-class Venture Capital funds and industry leaders.
one_liner: Hire staff fast without wasting hours on admin work ⚡️
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Human Resources

name: Plai
long_description: Plai is the advertising tool built for the 50million+ microbusinesses and creators. The platform lets them launch targeted ads from their phone in seconds, with no experience required. Instead of spending hundreds of hours learning Google Ads, TikTok Ads or spending a lot of money hiring an expensive agency, creators and micropreneurs can use Plai to launch their campaigns. Plai lets creators simply plug in their creative and budget, and Plai runs their advertising campaign using the best strategies from Google and Facebook.
one_liner: Launch targeted ads from your phone in seconds

name: Atlas
long_description: Atlas is building the operating system for restaurants. Atlas is the easiest way to start, run and grow any restaurant online and offline. We are the team that previously built Grain, a venture-backed online restaurant, to millions in revenue. Team and investors are from Grain, Accenture, Microsoft, Udacity, McKinsey, Salesforce, Y Combinator and others. https://atlas.kitchen
one_liner: Operating system for restaurants, focusing on Southeast Asia

name: CellChorus
long_description:
At CellChorus, we apply artificial intelligence to evaluate thousands of microscopy videos in parallel to evaluate how immune cells move, interact and perform over time. This allows our customers to discover, develop, manufacture and deliver cell therapies, antibodies, vaccines and other novel therapies faster, at lower expense, and with higher rates of success.

Our customers include top-25 biopharma companies and seed-stage biotechs that are developing cell therapies, antibody therapeutics and vaccines (including one of the few companies with an approved CAR T cell therapy).

Hear from the team at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IE9x_tm0XnI
one_liner: The dynamic single-cell analysis company

name: Output Biosciences
long_description: Output Biosciences is the world’s first preventative therapeutics company that extends human healthspan by combating chronic disease.
one_liner: Extending human healthspan

name: Abatable
long_description:
Abatable is the robo-advisor for high quality carbon offsetting. We help companies offset their hard to abate emissions through diversified portfolios of trusted carbon offsets which we source, evaluate and finance. Our team has the right founder-product fit to tackle this problem and have been close friends for over 10 years. Maria was previously VP at Goldman Sachs, where she worked with large companies on forestry investments and carbon procurement, and Valerio was a Product Manager at Monzo, Google and Facebook. 
We are targeting a $5B annual market opportunity from asset managers with existing net zero commitments as our initial customer segment.
one_liner: Carbon procurement platform for high quality offsetting

name: ContraForce
long_description:
ContraForce gives lean IT teams rapid visibility to threats and simple incident response management. Securing your business is easier than ever.

The easy button for cybersecurity management is here. Immediate security alert triage and incident response management – without the need for services or people that break the bank. Empower your lean IT team to become security experts.

Finally - the cybersecurity platform for small to medium businesses is here.
one_liner: The Cybersecurity Management Platform for Startups & SMB

name: Storylane
long_description: Storylane enables marketing and sales teams to create and share interactive product demos in 10 min. Prospective buyers can self-experience the demos without talking to sales. Our no-code platform allows teams (without any engineering help) to capture, personalize, add guides and publish a demo. These Demos can be embedded on websites, email campaigns or sales followups.
one_liner: Build Interactive Product Demo in 10 mins for SaaS companies

name: StrideQ (formerly SliceQ)
long_description:
StrideQ (formerly SliceQ) is the automated phone ordering system for restaurants which ensures no missed calls and no missed orders. Surprisingly, 33% of restaurant customers still prefer ordering via phone calls, but front desk staff is often busy and revenue is lost.

After enabling StrideQ our customers have increased their sales by over 10%, even while dealing with staff shortages in covid times.

Phone ordering is our wedge to become the point of sale system for all restaurants. StrideQ also streamlines dine-in and online orders in one single system. It helps to run restaurants more easily by effectively managing operations during weekend peak rush.
one_liner: Automated phone ordering system for restaurants

name: Byte Kitchen
long_description: Byte is able to quickly expand the geographic footprint of any given brand with minimal up front investment by licensing their IP, and rolling out their cuisine across a network of next generation kitchens optimized for delivery, pick up, and take out.
one_liner: Byte kitchen brings America's best restaurants to your neighbourhood

name: Moving Parts
long_description:
Moving Parts is a library of components for iOS. Everything your designers and engineers are building that isn’t unique to your app, we can do better and cheaper.

We're building high-level SwiftUI components that plug right into your application, made to solve real-world problems when designing and building a native mobile app.

Our components are also highly styleable and take care of responsiveness, localization, accessibility, and follow all platform best practices around dark mode, dynamic font size etc.
one_liner: Delightful components for iOS.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Membo
long_description: Membo is a next-day grocery delivery app for premium customers in Europe. Like PinDuoDuo Groceries in China, Membo is the fastest way to order your weekly groceries directly from local food producers. The convenience of supermarkets & 15-minute grocery apps comes at the expense of freshness: food that should be delivered fresh, gets bought in bulk and sits on warehouse shelves for days. To get the freshest produce, you need quick producer-to-end-customer delivery, not just quick warehouse-to-customer delivery. Membo lets you order food directly from hundreds of local food producers & organises delivery so you always get the freshest version of every product. Membo's CEO, Vahur Hansen, was an early engineer at TransferWise, and co-founder, Paula Kink, built her own healthtech startup. Launched in Dec 2020, we've grown 30% MoM for the past 8 months and have delivered over 4000 orders in Tallinn, Estonia.
one_liner: Groceries fresher than a farmer’s market, delivered to you (EU)

name: Orderli
long_description:
Orderli is tableside ordering for bars and pubs in Europe. Orderli works without downloading an app, guests can scan a QR code on the table, browser the menu and order what they want. 

For the staff we provide a simple app which gives them a better overview who is ordering and control of the orders that are sent to the kitchen.

In the backend we use predictions to recommend restaurant owners what to purchase and make changes to the menu in real-time.
one_liner: Square for Europe

name: Suplias
long_description:
Suplias is a B2B marketplace where mom and pop stores in Africa buy inventory directly from manufacturers using a mobile app
We have launched in Nigeria, where we have been growing by 40% monthly for the last 12 months
Our founding team has a combined 25+ years of experience in supply chain and ecommerce having worked for Procter & Gamble, Pepsi Co, Gap and Jumia, the #1 ecommerce company in Africa.
one_liner: Where small grocery stores in Africa buy inventory

name: Abhi
long_description: An early wage access platform allowing salaried employees to draw down a percentage of their accrued salary before the next payroll cycle. Helping employees to avoid late payment fee on bills, access emergency cash and substitute expensive debt. We work on a B2B2C model allowing companies to extend the product as a benefits program to their employee base.
one_liner: Abhi is Pakistan's 1st financial wellness platform focusing on…

name: Pandai
all_locations: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia; Remote
long_description:
💡 What is Pandai?

Pandai is an app that helps students get better grades in school. 

Pandai provides gamified quizzes aligned to a specific school curriculum, from which students can learn, practice, get feedback, and diagnose their weaknesses.

🔥 Why do we build this? 

In Southeast Asia, the education system is competitive and exam-oriented. 

There is a huge demand for interventions (tutors, workbooks, and extra classes) to help students perform better in school. Pandai fills the demand with a solution that is better than the alternatives.

👨‍🏫 Who We Are

The three founders are based in Malaysia and have known each other since high school, 23 years ago. 

After we graduated (from MIT & other US colleges), we started our first education company in 2007, focusing on coaching school students in STEM subjects.

We worked closely with students (many of them from underprivileged backgrounds) and saw firsthand the impact we’ve had on them. 

We then realized that with technology, we could reach more students and bring more impact. Hence, we released Pandai in 2020. 

🚀 Present & Future

Currently, we have launched in our home ground Malaysia in 2020. 

So far, 280,000 students have completed 83 million questions on Pandai, and 92% of users have seen some improvement in their academic performance. 

We plan to expand to Southeast Asia and other emerging markets, a market of 100M+ school students. Pandai is designed to be scalable, and our content (also available in English) can be mapped to other curricula from other countries.
one_liner: Learning app for school students in Southeast Asia

name: Verde
long_description: Verde is a digital platform that simplifies and expands access to loans for small and medium farmers in Brazil. We serve farmers locally with faster and more transparent financial resources.
one_liner: Digital lending platform for Brazilian farmers

name: Coinfeeds
long_description: Coinfeeds is an API that provides real-time news and social sentiment on any cryptocurrency. We provide the best data by applying the same machine learning technologies we used when leading the data teams at Uber and Robinhood. Our long term vision is to become the Bloomberg for crypto.
one_liner: Bloomberg for cryptocurrencies

name: idemeum
long_description:
idemeum is a Passwordless Application Management platform. Our vision is to provide a single place for small and medium businesses (SMBs) to set up and manage employee access to SaaS apps.

Behind the scenes we connect to any HR system and automate employee onboarding and account provisioning. Employees leverage mobile device biometrics to access any type of app - free or paid. 

Instead of deploying multiple tools for SSO, password management, and passwordless access, idemeum offers one platform to do it all.
one_liner: Passwordless application management platform.

name: Ruth Health
long_description:
Ruth Health treats the 83% of post-pregnancy womxn who pee in their pants. We deliver 30-minute Postpartum Recovery + Training Sessions via telehealth, so moms around the globe with pelvic floor prolapse can get back to work, sex, and normal life—5x faster.

Using conversational AI + biometric readings, Ruth Health will accumulate the largest, most diverse database in America on longitudinal maternal health
one_liner: Telehealth hub for pregnant people 🧡

name: CollabKit
long_description: CollabKit is a React SDK for adding comments, mentions and other collaborative features to your SaaS product. Ship sooner, boost activation and retention, and help your users work together as a team inside your product, with context.
one_liner: Add commenting to your product.

name: Baubap
long_description: Building the first digital bank for the economically vulnerable starting with a mobile lending app  for Mexico
one_liner: Smart micro financing for everyone

name: Oneistox
long_description:
Oneistox offers online cohort-based courses for designers, architects, and engineers from around the world for their professional growth. Learners are upskilling in subjects like Product design, Building Information design, Sustainable design, Computational design, Graphic design among others. 

Project-based learning and peer-to-peer interaction in cohort makes learning enriching and increases the completion rates to 82%. Learners work in groups of 2-6 on live projects and create significant outputs from scratch.

2000+ learners from 27 countries have already upskilled on Oneistox. The majority from India, Middle East and USA. 
Active community of 60,000 on social media.

The company is led by alumni of SPA Delhi and IIT Madras.
one_liner: Online cohort based courses in design and architecture

name: Kapacity.io
long_description:
Kapacity.io is building the future of smart energy grids with an electricity Load Balancing service focused on buildings.

By shifting electricity consumption to periods of lower electricity prices and higher renewable energy production, our customers pay less for electricity and emit less CO2 in their buildings. By combining these buildings into a Virtual Power Plant, Kapacity.io also participates in power grid balancing to help keep our lights on during moments of high energy demand.

Our customers are building owners, asset managers and energy companies who use Kapacity.io to reduce energy costs & emissions in their building portfolios. Buildings are responsible for 30% of global CO2-emissions. Our mission is to push that down to zero.
one_liner: Reducing energy costs & emissions in buildings.

name: Plug
all_locations: Rio de Janeiro, RJ, Brazil; Remote
long_description: Plug gives digital businesses access to multiple payments services through a single integration, and the ability to change between them on a transaction to transaction basis without writing code.
one_liner: Plug is an API to accept payments with multiple payment providers

name: Tuli Health
long_description:
Tuli health is turning all 11 000 independent pharmacies in the UK into diagnostic centers.  Our software makes it easy for these pharmacies to sell and fulfill COVID-19 tests today and other diagnostic tests tomorrow. Instead of waiting for a long time or travelling a long distance to receive the tests, customers can now receive tests in their neighbourhood, with results guaranteed in 24 hours. 

Tuli Health was launched in June, had onboarded 147 pharmacies, performed over 7000 diagnostic tests, and helped pharmacies generate $1.3 million in incremental revenue per month. 

The vision is to make every local pharmacy into a diagnostic center powered by Tuli Health.
one_liner: Transforming pharmacies in the UK into diagnostic centers

name: Stownest
long_description:
Valet self-storage solution for your personal storage needs. Be it household storage or seasonal belongings, we will pick them up and store them in our facility. You get it back when you need it. 

Service built on technology and strong customer experience fundamentals.
one_liner: Flexible On-Demand Storage Space for Household, SMEs & Travellers.

name: Filadd
long_description: With online courses, we help students graduate from University, starting from the admissions and throughout their entire college education until they graduate. All our courses include 24/7 interaction with our Tutors and Teachers making 95% of our users reach their desire score. We have prepared more than 10,000 students and in 2021 we have already made 800K which means 6X Year-over-Year growth.
one_liner: We help students in Latin America graduate from College.

name: Kiwi Biosciences
long_description: Kiwi Biosciences can help 18M Americans suffering from Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS) enjoy a normal meal without running to the bathroom two hours later. We develop novel, patent-pending enzymes that break down common digestive triggers in food.
one_liner: Patent-pending enzymes to break down common dietary triggers

name: Nasdisc
long_description:
Nasdisc is a marketplace for the $4B worth of records purchased every year.

The vinyl market has seen exponential growth in the past decade - the first 6 months of this year has already seen an increase of 108% in sales. Our platform takes a 12% cut, making this a $400mm opportunity that is more than doubling every year.

Pressing plants are backed up years out, bots buy limited releases in seconds, and record prices are skyrocketing in both retail and aftermarket sales. Despite this growth, the only dedicated marketplace is difficult to use, doesn’t process transactions, yet facilitates over $600mm in vinyl exchanges per year. 

This is why I finally decided to quit my job at Google and recruit my best friends from college to fix it. We’re all software engineers and have been passionate about music and vinyl since we were kids, and have $50k in records ourselves.

We started building a marketplace in July and launched our website 4 weeks ago. We now have $1k / week in sales, and $50k in listings.
one_liner: A marketplace for vinyl, cassettes and cds

name: Luable
long_description: Luable allows people in Latin America to compare and invest in 14% yield savings accounts online. Unlike the US, you cannot sign up for a savings account online in LatAm unless you are already a customer. We make it easier for anyone to do it online.
one_liner: Latin America's fixed-term investment platform

name: Caire Health
long_description: We believe that no emergency should have to wait. To make this a reality we build AI that instantly reads medical scans and enables critical care teams to make diagnoses better than radiologists. This saves lives by getting emergencies to treatment immediately and by discharging non-emergent patients quickly so the next emergency doesn’t have to wait either.
one_liner: Semi-Autonomous Diagnostics for Emergent Care

name: bloop
long_description: Nobody studies CS to spend their careers CTRL-F'ing their way through documentation and Stack Overflow. We surface code examples within the IDE, keeping developers in-flow.
one_liner: Radically better code-search
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Synth
long_description:
We are building a second brain for knowledge workers. Our app captures all the relevant information you consume - text, audio, video and summarizes it 1-click. It also makes it easy to search and retrieve the information you want, wherever you like.

All co-founders know each other since 2019 and met at a one-year AI fellowship. Since their time at the fellowship, they have felt frustrated creating their second brain while shifting between apps like Roam Research, and Obsidian. These applications were burdening them to do all three tasks of capturing, organizing, and retrieving, making the cost to value ratio of setting up the second brain really high. They decided to solve this and want to shift the burden of these steps on to software, making it easier for a user to build their second brain. 

Synth is targeting 30 million knowledge workers, who earn more than $100k, paying us $20 per month, presenting a $7.2billion market opportunity.
one_liner: Second brain for knowledge workers

name: Pylon
long_description:
Pylon provides water and electricity distribution companies, in emerging markets, with a platform for reducing their losses as well as opening new revenue streams. These losses are coming from leakages, consumption thefts, and uncollected bills, amongst others.
We have signed 11 utilities onto our platform across 2 countries and connected our systems to over 560k endpoints.
Today our average client has reduced their aggregate revenue losses by 45%
Expanding in Africa, LATAM, and SEA.
one_liner: Infrastructure management software for water & electricity companies

name: Dime
long_description: Dime lets creators turn their content into unique digital collectibles. Fans can buy items from their favorite artists, trade them on our marketplace, and display their collections on our site. Under the hood everything is secured using NFTs, but we take care of all of that. For creators it’s just like Patreon--except fans get to own a unique digital item in exchange for their support.
one_liner: Turn your content into unique digital collectibles.

name: Telivy
long_description: Telivy’s empowers SAAS platforms and insurance agencies with an embedded multi-carrier cyber insurance solution, providing the fastest and easiest solution to get cyber insurance for their small business customers. We are licensed to do business in 48 US states.
one_liner: Fastest way to purchase cyber insurance for small businesses

name: Zuma
one_liner: We help businesses convert leads into sales in minutes using text

name: PAYZE
long_description: Innovator of online transactions, helping businesses in former soviet union countries to accept payments from around the world through a single integration.
one_liner: Stripe for former Soviet Union countries

name: Humane Genomics
long_description: Humane Genomics is an artificial virus platform. We design and build oncolytic therapeutics with unprecedented selectivity and efficiency. Our first indications are bone cancer, liver cancer and small cell lung cancer.
one_liner: A platform to make artificial viruses as cancer therapeutics.

name: Algofi
long_description:
At Algofi, we're building the new financial system. Our work will reduce barriers to entry and promote democracy in the financial system.

Our team started by building the Algofi protocol on the Algorand blockchain. Algofi is a stableswap (e.g. Curve), constant product decentralized exchange (e.g. Uniswap), stablecoin (e.g. MakerDAO's DAI), and a cross collateral lending market (e.g. Aave). The Algofi protocol launched a little over six months ago and now secures over hundred million dollars.

At Algofi we think the future is am multi-chain world. We are now looking to grow the team aggressively in order to scale our efforts across the global blockchain ecosystem. Though we are early, we have secured our support from strong backers like Union Square Ventures, Arrington Capital, Jump Crypto, Coinbase Ventures, and more.
one_liner: Building the best DeFi experience

name: Female Invest
all_locations: London, England, United Kingdom; Copenhagen, Denmark; Remote
long_description:
Female Invest is on a mission to close the financial gender gap. By creating a safe space and a trusted source for knowledge, we’re democratizing investing for everyone globally.

We’ve created a platform that brings financial literacy to everyone. Now, we’re building a trading platform that helps our members achieve better, long-term financial outcomes, chipping away at one of the biggest issues of our generation: wealth inequality. 

Female Invest is a YC-backed company. We have raised approx. $8 million in total, and we are planning to do a Series A within the next 12 months. Our current investors include specialized FinTech VCs, previous successful founders as well as well-respected angel investors and institutions.

We're hiring!
one_liner: Female Invest is a social e-learning platform for investing

name: Ferveret
long_description: Ferveret develops liquid cooling technology for data centers inspired by nuclear power plant cooling. We save data centers 96% in cooling costs, 68% on capital costs and reduce their carbon footprint by 40% while increasing chip performance by 2X. Today about 40% of the electricity use of these facilities is wasted for cooling. Ferveret patent-pending technology revolutionizes the data center cooling and eliminates the waste of electricity. Furthermore, this technology can be implemented overnight in existing data centers with our uniquely designed tanks. The company is founded by Reza Azizian, MIT alumnus, one of the lead thermal architects for Microsoft HoloLens and at NVIDIA, and Matteo Bucci, an MIT professor with 15 years of experience in two-phase heat transfer for nuclear reactors. We have in lab proof of concept of our technology, and we are in the process of building demo units to launch pilot programs with our first two industrial customers. Some of our notable investors are YCombinator and E14 fund.
one_liner: Ferveret develops liquid cooling technology for data centers

name: Filta
long_description: Filta is the face filter NFT marketplace being built by veterans from Pixar/Oculus/Facebook. We partner with creators to release limited-edition filters for their fans to use on social media. It turns out: the face filters you see everywhere on Snapchat and Instagram are created by independent artists - not by the platforms. These artists ALMOST NEVER get money for their work - which is insane! Filta fixes this by giving these creators a marketplace and the best filter creation tool anywhere. Interested in working on the future of digital fashion, AR/VR, and web3? Hit us up. We're hiring.
one_liner: The Face Filter NFT Marketplace

name: Siglo
long_description: Siglo is a wireless ISP for communities in urban Latin America offering a faster, better, and easy-to-pay service.
one_liner: Home Internet for urban Latin America

name: Waterplan
long_description: Waterplan is the world’s leading climate platform to measure, respond, report, and monitor companies increasingly changing climate water risk. Customers include multinational companies like Coca-Cola, Diageo, Colgate & Ab InBev. The platform combines companies’ operational data with local water satellite imagery to provide a continuously updated financial assessment of water risk. Based on that, it offers tailored mitigation and adaptation opportunities, from conventional infrastructure to nature-based solutions. The company was founded by a team of tech and water 2nd-time entrepreneurs with two exits and almost ten years of experience working for Fortune 500 companies in water projects. Early investors include YCombinator, Giant Ventures, David Helgason, Leonardo DiCaprio, Richard Branson's family, Manu Ginobili, among others waterplan.com
one_liner: Water risk mitigation for industrial sites

name: Buoyant Aero
long_description: Buoyant Aero builds unmanned blimps that move middle-mile air freight at half the cost of a small plane. We're two MIT hardware engineers who've been friends for almost a decade, and we've built satellites and antennas at Astranis, Wafer, and OneWeb. So far, we’ve built and flown four airships - our most recent is 20 feet long and capable of speeds up to 35 miles per hour. We’ve also closed $5 million in LOIs and have two pilot programs planned. We're starting by improving air cargo in remote regions like Alaska and northern Canada, and will expand to move less-than-truckload shipments in low density parts of the world.
one_liner: Using drone blimps to move middle mile air freight at half the cost.

name: Argus
long_description: Argus is the next generation of employee compliance software for crypto and finance.
one_liner: The next generation of employee compliance

name: Bedrock AI
long_description:
Bedrock AI is software that extracts hard-to-find information in public company filing like annual reports. We find accounting policy changes, regulatory problems, and other material information that most analysts never see. This information is buried in 100s of pages of corporate reporting. Our web-based research tools facilitate detailed public company analysis at scale so that investors can cut research time and improve portfolio returns. 

We launched in April. Our customers include 3 hedge funds with over $25B in AUM and we have ongoing pilot contracts with 4 government agencies.  

The Bedrock team is a group of natural language processing researchers and CPAs with a mission to support accountability through information transparency. 

Learn more: https://bedrock-ai.com
Join our newsletter https://bedrock.substack.com/
Our free site: ledge.bedrock-ai.com
one_liner: Find what matters - investment research at scale
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Finance and Accounting

name: Greenwork
long_description: Greenwork helps government-funded training programs find jobs for the ten million people they train per year. Starting with this beachhead, we’re building LinkedIn for blue-collar workers to help companies make the most difficult hires in today’s labor market: skilled tradespeople.
one_liner: LinkedIn for Skilled Blue-Collar Workers
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Recruiting and Talent

name: Nomod
long_description: We're building a financial operating system for forward thinking businesses. We're starting with making it incredibly easy to sign up and start accepting card payments both in-person and online. Next up, we're working on holding money, spending money, making payments, and providing fast access to credit!
one_liner: Square minus the hardware

name: Genuity
long_description: Genuity is a one-stop-shop for companies to manage IT and buy business software. Companies use Genuity to keep track of all the company laptops, manage employee support requests, and buy software at wholesale prices.
one_liner: SaaS Platform to manage IT and buy business software

name: Genomelink
long_description:
Genomelink is a DNA App Store. If you got DNA tested from companies like 23andMe/Ancestry, you can transfer your DNA data to Genomelink and unlock hundreds of unique apps like:
🧬Global ancestry report that goes deeper than 23andMe.
🧬More varieties of body and mind traits analysis than that are available on Ancestry.

Team:
Tomo from M3, Inc. ($70B medical platform), Yuta from MyCode (#1 consumer genetic testing in Japan), Ken from Sony (tech & bio-info lead at a joint venture between Illumina and Sony), and Carlos Bustamante, P.I. from Stanford University. The investor and affiliates include Y Combinator (S21), Sompo (Top insurance CVC in Japan, led deals for Palantir and Noom), Sony, Berkeley SkyDeck, and StartX.
one_liner: DNA App Store

name: Telmai
long_description: Telmai is a data quality monitoring platform that helps data teams quickly detect and investigate data quality issues.
one_liner: Data quality profiling and monitoring

name: Infina
all_locations: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam; Remote
long_description:
Infina is Vietnam's leading retail investing app (like Robinbood, Groww, Ajaib), designed for young investors in a country of 100M.  Its mission is to make investing accessible, frictionless, and safe.  The platform is multi-asset, offering stock trading, mutual funds, and fixed-income products, with more asset classes to be added, including crypto. 

Infina was founded by James L. Vuong, a Silicon Valley engineer turned VC investor (IDG Ventures) and serial entrepreneur with a prior successful exit in Vietnam (Reddit of Vietnam, which was acquired by LINE corporation in 2017).

Investing apps are seeing explosive growth in many markets around the world, and this wave is coming to Vietnam. There is a growing middle class who are hungry to invest in assets like stocks and crypto. We are building Infina to capture this huge opportunity to democratize investing in South East Asia.
one_liner: Robinhood of Vietnam (retail investing app)

name: Lumify
long_description: Lumify is the digital home for all healthcare workers. With Lumify, healthcare workers can find, share, and buy the gear and resources they need to excel. We do this through Lumify’s line of products and marketplace, which unifies the brands, organizations, and resources that healthcare workers need and love.
one_liner: The super app for healthcare workers.

name: Pillar
long_description: Pillar powers board-approved health coaching, providing companies with the workforce and technology to launch or scale a coaching program in-house with measurable ROI. Our customizable platform reduces costs and improves engagement through virtual care from experts in lifestyle medicine and behavior change for less than building, staffing and optimizing a best-in-class coaching experience in-house.
one_liner: Infrastructure Layer for Health Coaching

name: Tenyks
long_description:
Tenyks is a University of Cambridge spin-out inventing the way humanity interacts with AI to protect the world from the terminator, but also to ensure that AI is developed with passion, excitement, and joy! 

We are building an MLOps monitoring and validation platform that helps ML developers working with computer vision data to build more reliable software faster. Specifically, our platform helps ML developers understand what's wrong with their algorithms and fix issues.

The founders developed the technology during their PhD research in Explainable AI for Computer Vision and it is the result of 9 top tier publications and 1 patent application.
one_liner: Inventing the way humanity interacts with AI

name: Chari
long_description:
Chari is an e-commerce and fintech app for traditional retailers in French-Speaking Africa allowing them to order any consumer goods they sell and get delivered for free in less than 24 hours. 
Chari is also a financial services provider for these retailers, offering them microloans
.
one_liner: B2B e-commerce and fintech platform for traditional proximity stores

name: Noloco
long_description: Noloco is a no-code platform for teams to create internal tools and customer-facing apps from their business data in data sources like PostgreSQL, Airtable & Google Sheets. All without writing a single line of code.
one_liner: Create no-code internal tools & customer apps from your business data.
subindustry: B2B Software and Services -> Engineering, Product and Design
industries: ["B2B Software and Services", "Engineering, Product and Design"]

name: Litnerd
long_description:
Litnerd is an online reading program that brings K-5 books to life by streaming live actors in the classroom. We blend the creator economy to traditional education, complete with ebooks and lesson plans. Litnerd will teach the 37 Million elementary school students in America how to read. 

Today schools spend approx. $20 Billion on reading and supplemental education programs. Yet 42% of their students still cannot read by 4th grade.

Litnerd is a contracted vendor with the largest education district in America, New York City Department of Education. Our program is currently implemented as designated classroom reading time across public schools. We have been growing aggressively at 60% MoM, used by over 14,000 paying students and hit $110K in ARR in less than 5 months.
one_liner: Teaching 37M students to read with live-stream actors

name: Dots 💸
long_description: Dots is a developer-friendly API that lets businesses pay their contractors through just a few lines of code. Whether its gig workers like Uber drivers, sellers on marketplaces like Etsy, or simply your local handyman - Dots’ abstracts away the complexity of payouts completely. We manage the entire process: information collection (KYC), payments through any rail (ACH, Venmo, CashApp, Zelle, international, and many more to come), and even filing tax forms! Dots lets developers get payouts up and running over just a few hours, rather than the many months this would normally take.
one_liner: Developer friendly drop in payouts infrastructure

name: Revery AI
long_description:
We are building the TikTok for fashion — a platform for creators to showcase their works, gain traction and build their brands. 

### Reverie is powered by two pieces of core technology:
- An AI-enhanced design tool for creators to turn their design ideas into e-commerce quality product images very efficiently.
- An AI-powered Virtual Dressing Room to create professional fashion photography directly from product images. Both fashion creators and other users can easily style outfits on different models.
